comments: Love it to pieces. The characters are loveable and the stories are fun. I got through three to four in a few days I can't put it down. The only downside is certain decisions cost gems. Major ones are fine and expected but to have to be a jerk to someone because you don't have enough kind of sucks a little. But it's not often and by no means a deal breaker.

Actually, I came here because I'm a fan of Jakayla Toney. I'm a reader from wattpad, and I'm checking out her story here as game. üòÇ Anyways, I finished one chapter and I'm enjoying so far. Gotta check out other book after I'm done. Looking forward to this app, though I don't really like the choices costing gems.But its okay, still like it. üòä

Every GOOD choice involved money.  Hard to find one interactive story game that doesn't involve money so much.  I don't mind paying for extra bonus scenes in the end but at least give us some GOOD selection WITHOUT charging!  Then maybe I'll rate it higher

I've really enjoyed reading All the Wrong reasons.  The author is very talented, a true story teller.  As I was reading I felt like part of the story I was so enveloped in the lives of the characters they were alive and real. I was sad when the story ended wanted to keep reading.  I was overjoyed when K. I. S. S.  came out by that very sane author who transported me to a whole new world yet again. I look forward to reading more from this amazingly talented storyteller!!

I'm frustrated by the fact that this is supposed to be a choose your own adventure game, but all the choices that make the most sense to me are stuck behind a paywall, requiring me to purchase those choices with a currency called diamonds. I get the story passes, and I would have been fine if that was the only barrier to read the story, but to require you to pay money for making what you feel are the right choices is just greedy.

The only reason I'm giving 3 stars is because the chapters update too late that you lose interest and sometimes forget what's happening in the story. If the chapters were to update on a regular basis then readers would feel the need to keep this app and will constantly play instead of playing the waiting game. However the content is good and most storylines get you hooked.
description: Choose your story with Chapters, the interactive story game that lets you choose your path in every story. Read through pages and pages of fun interactive stories that fit your mood, from romance to suspense!Choose your story from our top collection of romance, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, comedy, and drama series! Chapters combines a unique style of choose your own story gameplay with fiction stories that you simply can't put down!YOU get to make the choices in each story. Decide on hard life choices such as falling in love, discovering secrets, or unravelling deep mysteries! Make your choices wisely; every ending is different!Chapters Features:- Choose your story! Dive in and start making choices that affect the overall outcome!- Adventures start with you choosing your name and style to reflect your personality.- All stories come with info directly from the author!- Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!  50% Off starting March 20th until March 30th!Our exclusive collection of choose your story games include:ROMANCE - ALL THE WRONG REASONS- Romance story unfolds when YOU have a one night stand with the city's most notorious playboy.- Drama unfolds after a one night stand suddenly explodes into many more nights of forbidden passion.- Make the choice between what‚Äôs more important ‚Äì letting go of your insanely jealous boyfriend or keeping the complicated love affair going?DRAMA - PRINCE WITH BENEFITS- Fantasy story mixed with comedy! Play as the hopeless romantic that never seems to catch a break.- Make bold choices and decide how your romantic story unfolds with your almost knight in shining armor.- Drama arises when you find out that he's the Prince of England. For real.SUSPENSE - KIDNAPPING THE PRINCESS- Choose your life as a supermodel by day and a kidnapper extraordinaire by night.- Make the choice to play as the hero or villain who kidnaps the only heir to a whole country.- Make choices to pull off the biggest kidnapping ever while keeping your feelings for the Princess in check.HOLLYWOOD STORY - STARSTRUCK- Try surviving high school after a world-renowned actress suddenly puts her career on hold and enrolls in YOUR high school- Hollywood life isn‚Äôt what it seems, and you realize there's more to this media darling than meets the eye.- Romance is in the air, but can YOU avoid your crazy ex long enough to figure out this mess? ROMANCE - BAD BOY BLUES- Your life choices led to you becoming a master at playing the piano and fleeing problems.- These choices lead you to Adriano, a brooding mob boss, who steals your heart and the rest of you.- Romance blossoms and you decide to jazz things up and stand your ground.- Have your life choices made you tough enough to rescue your handsome kidnapper and make the murderous rival family dance to your tune?"SUPERNATURAL ROMANCE - MR. DEVIL- When your boyfriend falls terminally ill, you make a deal to save him: spend the rest of your life together or surrender your soul to Hell.- Then you discover your boyfriend is cheating on you, so do you break up with him? The Devil comes to collect his prize...you.- Transported to Hell, you face difficult choices that determine whether you will survive fire and brimstone, fallen angels, and hot gossip.- And more importantly, can you find everlasting love, not in Heaven or on Earth, but with Mr. Devil himself?And more interactive story games with fun choices!Chapters: Interactive Stories will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. Whether you're an avid reader of drama, comedy, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, romance, or even a gamer, you‚Äôll love making choices in this interactive story game!Please note that Chapters: Interactive Stories is an online game that requires an internet connection to play.Follow us on: facebook.com/ChaptersInteractiveStories
descriptionHTML:
Choose your story with Chapters, the interactive story game that lets you choose your path in every story. Read through pages and pages of fun interactive stories that fit your mood, from romance to suspense!

Choose your story from our top collection of romance, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, comedy, and drama series! Chapters combines a unique style of choose your own story gameplay with fiction stories that you simply can't put down!

YOU get to make the choices in each story. Decide on hard life choices such as falling in love, discovering secrets, or unravelling deep mysteries! Make your choices wisely; every ending is different!

Chapters Features:
- Choose your story! Dive in and start making choices that affect the overall outcome!
- Adventures start with you choosing your name and style to reflect your personality.
- All stories come with info directly from the author!
- Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers! 50% Off starting March 20th until March 30th!

Our exclusive collection of choose your story games include:

ROMANCE - ALL THE WRONG REASONS
- Romance story unfolds when YOU have a one night stand with the city's most notorious playboy.
- Drama unfolds after a one night stand suddenly explodes into many more nights of forbidden passion.
- Make the choice between what’s more important – letting go of your insanely jealous boyfriend or keeping the complicated love affair going?

DRAMA - PRINCE WITH BENEFITS
- Fantasy story mixed with comedy! Play as the hopeless romantic that never seems to catch a break.
- Make bold choices and decide how your romantic story unfolds with your almost knight in shining armor.
- Drama arises when you find out that he's the Prince of England. For real.

SUSPENSE - KIDNAPPING THE PRINCESS
- Choose your life as a supermodel by day and a kidnapper extraordinaire by night.
- Make the choice to play as the hero or villain who kidnaps the only heir to a whole country.
- Make choices to pull off the biggest kidnapping ever while keeping your feelings for the Princess in check.

HOLLYWOOD STORY - STARSTRUCK
- Try surviving high school after a world-renowned actress suddenly puts her career on hold and enrolls in YOUR high school
- Hollywood life isn’t what it seems, and you realize there's more to this media darling than meets the eye.
- Romance is in the air, but can YOU avoid your crazy ex long enough to figure out this mess?

ROMANCE - BAD BOY BLUES
- Your life choices led to you becoming a master at playing the piano and fleeing problems.
- These choices lead you to Adriano, a brooding mob boss, who steals your heart and the rest of you.
- Romance blossoms and you decide to jazz things up and stand your ground.
- Have your life choices made you tough enough to rescue your handsome kidnapper and make the murderous rival family dance to your tune?"

SUPERNATURAL ROMANCE - MR. DEVIL
- When your boyfriend falls terminally ill, you make a deal to save him: spend the rest of your life together or surrender your soul to Hell.
- Then you discover your boyfriend is cheating on you, so do you break up with him? The Devil comes to collect his prize...you.
- Transported to Hell, you face difficult choices that determine whether you will survive fire and brimstone, fallen angels, and hot gossip.
- And more importantly, can you find everlasting love, not in Heaven or on Earth, but with Mr. Devil himself?

And more interactive story games with fun choices!

Chapters: Interactive Stories will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. Whether you're an avid reader of drama, comedy, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, romance, or even a gamer, you’ll love making choices in this interactive story game!

Please note that Chapters: Interactive Stories is an online game that requires an internet connection to play.

Follow us on: facebook.com/ChaptersInteractiveStories
developerAddress:
2051 JUNCTION AVENUE #212
SAN JOSE CA 95131

comments: Worked fine yesterday, logged in this morning and it now says I'm back to level 14 with no diamonds stars or coins and barely nothing on the island??!!! No way of contacting support/help desk either as just get error message when trying. Hugely disappointed after all the months of playing!

Should have longer time on the tradefest. Not everyone has time to just sit on the game 24/7.  More opportunities to win things. Don't like how I have to pay to plant my own crops on my own island though?! And why has the harvest count changed? Why make bad changes to the game? It just shys people away.

Loved this game and the players in it. BUT if you are not in their beta test group it's getting discouraging that you are not treated as equal as the others and you need to put much more effort and time to get rewards and move along in the levels. Don't start unless you like to be treated with no respect at all

Well the game is great!! This morning when I was using it tho the time it would take for things to be done was reduced greatly, everything was 2 mins, 5 mins, 10 mins and 15, and I was impressed and decided that if its a new update I'd glady play more often. The second time I went back on everything was back to the old time period of production. I was disappointed and didn't bother to spend even 5mins more on it. I believe everyone would find it more exciting to play if the time for production wasn't so long. I hope that this can happen in another update, if not, well I can't do nothing about that.

Gave it a lower rating because I sent 3 messages to support regarding loading error and never received a response just kept sending me to the games web page which was of no help. Very fun game but no support it seems

I love this game! It is my favorite! I like how can earn gems! I love the different 'contests.' However, I tried really hard to get the snowy owl and didn't make it in time. Now I'm not playing as much but still love the game!

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Paradise! Build your tropical island, discover new lands, and trade with friends, merchants, and adorable animals.

Join Keani, Skippy, and the rest of our quirky crew as you create a thriving seaport and restore Paradise Bay to its former glory! Get excited, because life is better at the beach.

FEATURES:
• Create and customize your very own tropical paradise
• Explore and expand your island to unlock its secrets
• Collect long-lost map pieces to discover new areas of the world

SUPPORT:

Everything is basically pay to upgrade or spend forever trying to save up and even then. Bottom line ftx games are a scam. A shame too I really liked the game at first. descriptionHTML:
Destroy your enemies and become a powerful Capo - the leader of your own cartel in the official game of NARCOS!

Power. Loyalty. Warfare. Product.

Step into the dangerous and thrilling role of cartel kingpin in the official game of the hit television show NARCOS. Decide between leading through raw power or gathering respect through loyalty. Sometimes bad people do good things… In the end you must decide, will it be “Plata o Plomo”?

NARCOS
Learn the ropes of running an operation from El Patron himself and manage your “relationship” with the authorities through agents Murphy and Pena. Enter the world of Narcos with exciting events and updates of content from the show.

Recruit and build
Choose Plata and hire sicarios and build your defenses. Collect different sicarios, level them up and have them defend your base and add bonuses to production.

Wage War
Choose Plomo and send sicario led death squads to take over high value resources from other player cartels.

Profit
Develop your operation by building out your jungle finca with processing plants and labs. Select smuggling lines and plans to maximize revenue.

Cartel
Team up with other players to form cartels, lay siege to enemy cartel compounds in multi-day campaigns for domination.

There is money and power to be made. From now on, nowhere is safe.

About NARCOS:
Narcos is an inside look at the men who would stop at nothing to take down the cocaine drug lords. From the Colombian government to the DEA agents, from the policemen who would risk their lives to the US officials who would spin the story. Narcos is an unfiltered look into the war that would change the drug trade forever.

comments: New Review because of update: ¬∞ I really love this game. I'm hooked. Relaxing yet stimulating. Some levels are easy as cutting through soft butter with lots of delightful bombs and others take several tries to master and need that one devise a strategy and some others are much up to luck. I love that variation: relaxing and stimulating and sometimes a bit frustrating. ¬∞ I had finished all the levels of version 2 and then waited for an update which came with new levels and I finished them also about 4 weeks ago. I've opened the game every day since to see if yet an other update came, and yes, yesterday it did and have already finished all levels (that says more about my fanaticism than it says about the difficulty of the game). ¬∞ I appreciate the tournament (I topped the monthly yesterday but had dropped 3 steps while I was sleeping and have clawed my way back to the top this evening, but I guess I'll be back down tomorrow. But it's fun! And I got generous daily prizes. ¬∞ And I love the new version that even though I again have finished all levels, I can just go on playing thanks to the Level Tower (even if it at 46 repeated a previous level). ¬∞ Lovely graphics, good game sound.
Annoying and boring. Got headaches playing this. You can spend 5 sets of 5 lives each without passing the task. It's rather a "Push to pay or wait forever" game. Uninstalled. Sorry.
i was really looking forward to playing this game but everytime i tried to play it, it loads to where she introduces herself and then cuts out of the game üòîüòîüòîüòî not happy with it
I had free lives then it frozen on me i lost them.she jyst sanding there on phone .i still cant play game There is a lot of problems with this game.plz fix it

descriptionHTML:
Build a zoo, play with cute animals and solve match 3 puzzles - all in one game!

Switch between the challenge of the match 3 levels, and the joy of welcoming a new furry friend to the zoo you built with your hands.

The Family Zoo was once the gem of the neighborhood. Now, the city wants to build a huge supermarket instead. It’s time to burst their bubble!

Solve casual match three puzzles to earn tickets and materials. Then, restore the zoo and decorate the animal habitats and surrounding gardens.

Meet new and old friends, and work together to make sure all the animals have a place to live. They are counting on you - can you save their home?

Game Features
✿ Swap between match 3 levels and building your own zoo!
✿ Hundreds of delicious and challenging match 3 puzzles
✿ Choose from thousands of decorations to make your family zoo unique!
✿ Interact with exotic and cute animals
✿ Develop your business with stands, cafes and other attractions to draw visitors and earn coins!
✿ Complete quests for more rewards and advancing the story
✿ Make friends with characters that will help you save the zoo
✿ Enhance your fun with exploding watermelons and other wacky boosters

summary: Crush Match 3 Puzzles, Complete Fun Quests and Save the Animals!
title: Family Zoo: The Story

At the start you can play for about 1-2hrs; Then you have to wait for 8 more hours because you can't upgrade anything, or earn anything. From then on it's more of a chore then anything fun. The game starts out confusingly so lots will spend the free in game currency they give you, that you desperately need to speed up pack openings! Then before you even know how the game progresses they ask for a review, and reward the player for giving a 4 or 5 star rating(these are the only options). Not very admirable practice in my opinion! description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers‚Äô experience more personal and memorable ‚Äì just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don‚Äôt forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!IMPORTANT NOTE:Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant! Features:* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients* 19 unique locations* More than 400 levels to complete* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interiorCooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:* Access location ‚Äì to provide region specific in-game offers* Access external storage ‚Äì to correctly save your progress
descriptionHTML:
Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant!

Features:
* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients
* 19 unique locations
* More than 400 levels to complete
* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior

Cooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:
* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers
* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress

comments: Stop..do not download. This game has a bug and will stop responding when you get to the higher levels.  Support has not been able to find a fix.  After a certain level, the clues you will be given are the same every time and will be for an earlier game.

Fun little time waster. Nothing locked behind p2w. Makes you think of the full picture. If I were to criticise one side of this game is that many words are repeated on different pictures. I have lost count how many times "windows" was a answer BUT overall very fun.

Very addicting!  Hard to stop playing! Would like to be able to select any square to enter a letter so I can try different letter combinations when trying figure out a word. Right now, it seems you have to enter the letters largely in order.
A little bit glitchy but a good way to waste hours when you're bored. Keeps asking to rate the app. Dont bother collecting coins to buy background as the disappear the next day.

Great you will fly through levels. And then one answer will stop you and get in your head. It will be soooo obvious you will kick yourself. Thankfully you can send to a friend to help through facebook
LOVE TO PLAY THIS GAME! NO PROBLEMS WITHE FREEZING UP OR MOVING TO NEXT LEVEL. SIMPLY ENJOYABLE FOR YOUR BRAIN.

comments: the new fusion medals added make it so you can not fuse heros without spending money this game is officially broken theres no free way to advance anymore dont download. its very sad i like the idea behind the medals but whos going to grind with 0 progress for 8 months and still not get thier first 6 star .... its messed up

All in all a fun game which u dont have to pay for.. on lvl 104 now and still enjoying the game and actually progressing too.. thumbs up from me! Update: dropped down to 3* after update. Totally been made to p2w now by adding stupid fusion medals.. was a hrund before but now almost unplayable.. greed have ruined the game for me and will probably uninstall.. many others also when u go in chat room.. not good epic summoners, not good at all.. good game ruined again :(

Latest update with fusion medals ruined the game. Got stuck like many other players. Fusing was hard enough without them (ie collecting 4 same 4 star heroes plus 4 same 3 star, PLUS random 4 star heroes... Ridiculous) to get 5 star one, now you stuck waiting to lvl up your current ones to pass stage boss and MAYBE get fusion medals... Ruined very good game.

What the hell are you people thinking,.  Fusion Medals are the most ridiculous thing to add to the game.   It was bad enough the game cost so much to play, but then you really screw us over good with Fusion medals.   Crooks,. You guys should be in jail. Class action law suit.  Horrible,.   Don't play this game, waste of your time and big money.

They absolutely ruined this game with the last 2 updates! Be prepared to spend a fortune to be competitive! They took away the best parts of the Game! Added another item you need to make heroes that are very difficult to get! Then they reduced the number of dark soul you get when disassembling heroes! I'm a paying customer, don't mind supporting development but not when you feel taken advantage of! Don't recommend this game! Very Very Greedy company! Planners should Be Fired!

New updates have killed game experience.  Now not only do you have to wait to gain xp for adventure levels,  you are now limited on fusing characters.  Lack of ability to gain fusion medals limits game play. Very few other actions log in and play 10 minutes a day and then nothing to do for another whole day.  No ability to move at your own pace.  Everything is limited.  To those that can endure slow pace only way to gain in game is slowly over time with daily log ins.

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers

The alliances of Good and Evil have been forged. The final battle between epic warriors and heroes on both sides is about to start. Ride the crest of the Idle RPG wave with Epic Summoners!

Prepare your best summoner heroes for the fight. Join friends and players from across the globe as you embark on an epic action journey of enchantment to explore the Magic Ladder and the secrets contained deep within. Lead your action troops -heroes and warriors- into the light and overcome all battle challenges that lay before you to emerge victorious in an epic war! The world's destiny is in your hands!

ENGROSSING ACTION RPG GAMEPLAY
Your summoner heroes can’t wait to fight auto-battles against the enemy on your behalf! Recruit and gain experience with every powerful war hero in a legendary battle in this idle game!
Epic equipment and legendary summoner heroes and warriors challenge waiting for you!
Earn awesome combat rewards even when you’re offline. No need to stress when life calls!

ENDLESS TACTICAL AND STRATEGIC FUN
Plan your battle troops tactics and maneuver with your legendary hero to secure victory, it's your free action RPG destiny!
Collect, upgrade and use your equipment wisely to show off your strength as leader on an legendary epic adventure game!
Simple, yet effective strategy combat allows you to enjoy this RPG at home or on the go! Plan your characters tactics and troops maneuver and dominate the battlefield to defeat every evil challenge hero and enemy warriors adventure troops!

THRILLING ACTION BATTLE CONTENT TO KEEP YOU ON YOUR TOES
Summon and recruit summoner heroes and legendary warriors troops, deploy, defend, fight, collect and upgrade to accomplish your RPG challenge!
Between the Expedition Airship, Arena, Magic Ladder and Wishing Pond, there’s a huge world to explore in this idle war game and new creatures to find!
Your interest will never waver with our steady stream of great war content! Challenge your friends and defeat players from all over the world in this free action RPG!

A HIGH QUALITY VISUAL AND AUDIO FEAST
Exquisite warriors' aesthetics and creatures artwork in this free action RPG adventure full of fun and challenges!
Jaw dropping epic combat and maneuver animations in the arena and awe inspiring action battle challenge effects!

THROW DOWN WITH PLAYERS AND FRIENDS
Step into our battle warriors RPG Arena and compete with skilled players from all over the world! Recruit new legendary summoner heroes and warriors troops with different abilities to defeat every evil enemy!
Change your tactics and action maneuver against rivals to see your name climb the rankings and beat your friends best scores!
Win awesome battle rewards on your way to claiming the ultimate victory wih your army in this action hero war idle game!

Start now this epic adventure challenge with your best legendary hero and powerful warriors action in a fantasy adventure with different creatures and battlegrounds in a non-stop free RPG! Your destiny is to lead your magic summoner legendary heroes guild army and war troops in a battle adventure to the death!

recentChanges: TONS OF FUN!
Airport City's residents are preparing to celebrate St. Patrick's Day!

Holy moly! Have you seen the dancing leprechauns all around the city? Catch them, assemble the collection and get an awesome bonus: a Pot of Gold! It'll increase your commercial buildings' profitability.

comments: This game is a lot of fun get to customize some great cars . A lot of my favorites and i was surprised to see some cool muscle cars . Very unique collection of cars. This is actually better than their console games. Well recent carbon and most wanted are amazing. The newest are hot garbage. This one is fun.reallywish there was free roam or a sand box room where you can admire and test drive  what you have grinded out so many hours to get. Only bad thing. Also the boxes are too expensive leaving having to grind way too much just for absolutely anything. By the time you get anything good this game servers will be empty.

Thank you for making this awesome game, I love it! I've not had this much fun playing a Need For Speed game in years.. Update 2.9.1 is fantastic. Although after updating, I'm having trouble connecting to the game servers... :/ Hope it gets sorted soon! nevertheless, I look forward to future updates. ;)

It's a great game, graphics are ok, smooth playing. But. There are some ideeas that may do something different. Think about a chat room, or a place where players can do some trades. Think about adding the possibility for players to get vip points for watching videos, or maybe one day..open world gameplay. And there could be a lot more features. Thumbs up if you agree.

The gameplay/races r so short. It takes less than a minute to finish it. And the police cars than u see in the gameplay don't even do anything they just keep going on on there own, sometimes getting to finish line before u. So basically this would be a perfect game for a three year old but incredibly boring for anyone over the age of 7

I just bought a golden crate for 100 golds, only to get a muscle ECU uncommon part. Disappointing,  no blue prints. Even in a free crate you get blue prints.  Frustrating the reward system is horrible. Am never going to buy any golden crate. Players should be given choices to buy golden crate but you get trusted upon with useless worthless part. Otherwise good game

The game is pretty good, being a free mobile game, it is not trying to hide it's PTW features, but you can do mostly everything without having to spend a penny. One suggestion I think needs to be put in place is a confirmation window when you go to skip a level, because I was doing the speedhunter event for the Mazda MX-5, and accidentally hit the skip race button and lost a lot of gold, maybe not letting me even get the upgraded car now.

descriptionHTML:
Race for dominance in the first white-knuckle edition of Need for Speed made just for mobile – from the developer that brought you Real Racing 3. Build your dream ride with an unbelievable range of cars and customizations. Launch yourself between chaos and control as you hit the loud pedal and roll into underground car culture. Pick up the real-world cars you’ve always wanted, from the Subaru BRZ to the BMW M4, McLaren 650s, Porsche 911, and more. DRIVE FAST – AND FEARLESS
Steer onto the streets of Blackridge, driving reckless and juiced as sparks fly. Accelerate over jumps and around debris, into traffic, against walls, and through high-speed Nitro Zones. Flip on the nitrous and thrust yourself into another level of adrenaline-fueled driving and drifting. Around every corner is a fresh race as you clash with local crews and local cops. It’s a world full of wannabe drivers – can you stay in front and earn respect?

Plarium do not like Aussies. They charge us extra money for offers.   A top end offer is $100 USD for the Americans. Which is $120-125 AUD after currency conversion for Australians. Yet for some reason our offers are $160 AUD. $35 AUD more then we should be paying.   I do not know how this practice has gone without incident as I thought there were supposed to be good anti descrimination laws and consumer laws in place that prevent the charging of extra to countries just because they do not like that country.   This is a morally disgusting practice as it is the same concept as charging more to others purely on the basis because they have a different skin colour, gender or religion.   I want to know why Australians are paying an extra $35 AUD then we should be as other mobile games. One example being Battle Mobile do the correct currency exchange rate and only charge $125 AUD after conversion from $100 USD. If other mobile games do it correctly why are Plarium choosing not to?  Edit: @ Plarium employee who just lied in response to me. Plarium set all prices up themselves through Google Playstore. NOT Google.

description: Step into the next generation of MMO strategy in Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare. Train your troops, build your base and command an army against your enemies. Conquer Black Sites and outposts full of resources, and team up with friends to take total control of the battlefield!The year is 2037, and the evil Phoenix Corporation has taken control of Selva De Fuego - the world‚Äôs only source of a new lifesaving serum. The world has declared war on Phoenix, giving every private military and mercenary force a green light to invade Selva De Fuego and do whatever it takes to crush the rogue corporation.This where you come in. As the commander of a division of seasoned soldiers of fortune, your mission is to defeat Phoenix before your rivals - but it won‚Äôt be easy. Standing between you and victory are the most elite mercenaries and devastating weapons on the modern battlefield.Use a cutting-edge arsenal of weapons including advanced assault vehicles, tanks and futuristic military drones to prepare for all-out warfare in the mobile sequel to the award-winning hit Soldiers Inc.‚Ñ¢.NOTE: Please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare‚Ñ¢Game Features‚úî FREE TO PLAY‚úî Available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean and Russian.‚úî Incredible graphics with motion-captured hero characters and stunning 3D maps.‚úî Compete online in realtime massive multiplayer clan warfare.‚úî Train and upgrade your troops and combat systems to create an unstoppable army.‚úî Develop and deploy the next generation of military weapons across an ever-evolving battlefield.‚úî Attack or Defend - reposition your base and customize your outposts to back up your strategy.‚úî Participate in intense, tactical PvP against players all around the world.‚úî Single-player PvE missions, tournaments, rewards, and achievements.‚úî Forge an alliance, cooperate with teammates and devise strategies to defeat your rivals.‚úî Live operations with hundreds of different events and leaderboards to play across single player and PvP.
descriptionHTML:
Step into the next generation of MMO strategy in Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare. Train your troops, build your base and command an army against your enemies. Conquer Black Sites and outposts full of resources, and team up with friends to take total control of the battlefield!

The year is 2037, and the evil Phoenix Corporation has taken control of Selva De Fuego - the world’s only source of a new lifesaving serum. The world has declared war on Phoenix, giving every private military and mercenary force a green light to invade Selva De Fuego and do whatever it takes to crush the rogue corporation.

This where you come in. As the commander of a division of seasoned soldiers of fortune, your mission is to defeat Phoenix before your rivals - but it won’t be easy. Standing between you and victory are the most elite mercenaries and devastating weapons on the modern battlefield.

Use a cutting-edge arsenal of weapons including advanced assault vehicles, tanks and futuristic military drones to prepare for all-out warfare in the mobile sequel to the award-winning hit Soldiers Inc.™.

NOTE: Please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare™

Game Features

✔ FREE TO PLAY
✔ Available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean and Russian.
✔ Incredible graphics with motion-captured hero characters and stunning 3D maps.
✔ Compete online in realtime massive multiplayer clan warfare.
✔ Train and upgrade your troops and combat systems to create an unstoppable army.
✔ Develop and deploy the next generation of military weapons across an ever-evolving battlefield.
✔ Attack or Defend - reposition your base and customize your outposts to back up your strategy.
✔ Participate in intense, tactical PvP against players all around the world.
✔ Single-player PvE missions, tournaments, rewards, and achievements.
✔ Forge an alliance, cooperate with teammates and devise strategies to defeat your rivals.
✔ Live operations with hundreds of different events and leaderboards to play across single player and PvP.

Click all day and then let rich superstars take your biz to the next level! Become a money-crazed business tycoon as you see your riches grow.

The rich life lets you accumulate millions and billions of dollars while your workers do all the work for you.

The idle clicker adventure to fame starts now!

Cash, Inc. Features:

TAPPING GAME THAT MAKES YOU RICH
• Tap, tap, tap and get rich while barely lifting a finger!
• Idle clicker paradise - profit from your businesses without actually being there!

BUSINESS TYCOON AMENITIES:

• Money is no object when you can earn free gifts from the Spin Wheel like tickets, crystals and time jump to build your riches even more!

SHARE YOUR WEALTH
• Rich List – Work your way up and join a community of business elites in the Cash, Inc. leaderboards.
• Make it rain money and brag about your riches on social media!
• Be a money machine and compare what you own against other business tycoons around the world.

Tap to keep your cash flow healthy and thriving as you continue building your business, fortune and reputation. Get famous and become the most successful business tycoon in this idle clicker game. Watch as the rich and famous fight for your favor in Cash, Inc.!

Download now to start your own business adventure to fame and fortune!

comments: I d give it 10/10 if there way a search button to look for mayors, more communication options (private/public) messaging to facilitate talking in the game etc..and concerning the gameplay, it would better if devs reduce the production time of items. It takes way longer and as players we dont have all day to play even if we used boosters and in game cash !

Wonderful game indeed. The only thing is missing is the financing part. Would be really nice to have a banking inductor a stock market where you could trade financial products like other cities bonds or debt. Financing during the game can be a big problem so having a financial hub from where you could trade and borrow would be really useful. Thank you for developing this amazing game.

This game is crazy and awesome at the same time. My population has been awesome. Just 2 months and it was from 0 - 92 000+! The crazy part is when I see a blue hospital sign, the people dont even tell good reasons. ALL THEY DO IS SAY, Sometimes I go to the clinic just to read MAGAZINES! My citizens are so crazy JUST BEACAUSE IN ONE HECTARE, I AM A GOOD MAYOR!

Too much waiting for things to get made and produced. The storage and items for upgrades FAR too difficult to get. 42 items to raise storage by 5 items. And it can take weeks to find all the items. When you go to global storage and find an item that you really need, by the time that you get there, it's already sold! üò† Also, it takes 3 different items, and you have 3 of one item and 24 of another. Really? Also, it should be that you get needed items more often, randomly rather than at specific times. Other than that, a good game.

Like the competition challenges it holds your attention. the time frames of production are a little long however the markets move products fast. I also like the club wars and the mayors challenges. My dislike is there are not enough thought bubbles in the fact that you only get two the rewards should be more frequently.

The new arenas for war are terrible... There is a massive lag time... I can't even get to the war after rebuilding until the game thinks for approximately 45 seconds... By the time I actually get one shot off it's a minute and a half... Then I'm almost dead and you come back with I'm sorry we're experiencing connectivity issues get it fixed please!
description: Welcome, Mayor! Be the hero of your very own city as you design and create a beautiful, bustling metropolis. Every decision is yours as your city gets larger and more intricate. Make smart choices to keep your citizens happy and your skyline growing. Then trade, chat, compete, and join clubs with fellow Mayors. Build your way to extraordinary with the most popular city builder on mobile!BRING YOUR CITY TO LIFEBuild skyscrapers, parks, landmarks, factories, and much more! Place buildings strategically to keep the taxes flowing and your city growing. Solve real-life challenges like traffic, fires, and pollution. Provide services like power plants and police departments, and boost your population with parks and education. Keep traffic moving with grand avenues and streetcars. Take on fun challenges to shape your society.PUT YOUR IMAGINATION ON THE MAPExpand along the beach with a marina, waterpark, and luxury beachfront. Build a Tokyo-style neighborhood and unlock exclusive landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Statue of Liberty. Discover innovative technologies with Future Cities and get athletic with sports stadiums. Hit the town with Las Vegas buildings and go Hollywood with movie studios. There‚Äôs always something new and different to make your city unique.BATTLE YOUR WAY TO VICTORYCompete in real-time PvP with Club Wars, where you strategize with Mayor‚Äôs Club members and declare war on other cities. Once the battle is on, unleash crazy disasters on opponents, like the Disco Twister and Plant Monster, to do damage and watch the wreckage happen live. Earn disaster cards, SimCash, and other valuables to use in battle or to improve your city. Also, take on other players in the Contest of Mayors. Complete weekly challenges and climb the ranks to advance through Leagues. Become a top Mayor and get rewards that can upgrade and beautify your city.CONNECT AND TEAM UPJoin a Mayor‚Äôs Club to trade supplies with other members and chat about strategies and available resources. comments: Great fun but it would be helpful if there was more information on starting up. The little things like having to click on the stars over your dragons in order to allow someone else to play with them. That sort of thing. Otherwise it's a great game and it provides me with hours of fun and relaxation.

I have been playing this game since 2012. It used to be great, but in the past 1-2 years it has become insane. The events are ALWAYS overlapped with 2-3 events happening simultaneously, and they have become much more difficult to complete. It is literally impossible to collect every dragon without spending some big bucks, and the only way to enjoy this game is to focus on only getting the dragons you like. This still proves to be difficult given the 1000+ dragons released already...

Game is ok easy to follow and play. Constslly full of ads and server sync so takes forever to get in if its lets you in and then start the ads, annoying request from side ventures to get more cash from you. Apple verson has more and programers to lazy to do same here but make you compete against them

This game is getting better and closer to equal to ios but still needs some work. More dragons should have their own type and not all mashed into the star. Also all buildings and arena need this the type chooser. More mining land and better crops are needed. Please fix the emoji so android can use its system wide color emoji now. Out of curiosity why does ios get a new description announcing the codex and Android is always bug fixes. You guys could just copy and paste that but don't even bother to change for us Android users?

I got a new phone and when I transferred all of my app's it did Not transferr my levels!! I had hours of fun, not so sure now. I still play and love it. I wish we could get more gold through friends or the wheel.

Been playing for few years now. Used to be great game but now when I play all of a sudden the game freezes and everything Ive done in last minute or so disappears. I thought it might be my tablet but after purchasing new tablet the problem still exists. I now know its the game as I have noticed that when game freezes and then restarts, I have a progress sign appear and when I click on it it tells me the progress of a dragon that gives you two gold as a reward but I am doing nothing to trigger this. This is seriously frustrating when using a boost on bingo leagues as the countdown doesnt freeze. Fix this and it's 5 stars all the way.

comments: Challenging game against live players. Lots of contests and bonuses. Levels of play from beginner to world class. One drawback: all levels are open entry, so more experienced (and less ethical) players will enter into Beginner to collect quick victories. The designers should change the game so that once a badge is completed, players should not be able to enter games on that level again. This would be fair play for beginners, encouraging them to continue playing. Hope this is implemented in an update.

Game graphics and play are great. However dice rolls are seriously flawed. Doubles way too often. Not even close to real rolling. I've seen 2 sets of doubles in way to many starts of the game. If doubles are so common why don't you ever see 3 doubles in a row to start. Don't ever leave a piece open because the next roll will knock you almost every time. The developer obviously likes frustration proven by the childish limited chat emojis.
They need to fix the dice roll. Its absolutely a big cheat...no way can some roll exactly what they need to get out of a tight position that often. Its really horrible it ruins the whole game.

I think it's safe to say based on the dice timing, that this game app, like all the rest, is favoring a particular player in order to end the game quicker. The auto play is annoying and not possible to turn off.. but the layout is nice.

It's the worst game i have ever played , they are thieves , when you double and you lose they deduct twice the bet and when u win they only give you 45 percent of ur total winning money.I played a game and won 255 thousand , but they only gave me 120 thousand , and when i lost they took out 255 thousand from my money.If you dont believe me count ur chips and see.They suck so go to hell with this lame unfair idiot game.
The dice rolling is not random at all !  It gives ridiculously lucky dices and game over in 3 or 4 turns. Do not play it. NO RANDOM DICE, NO FUN AT ALL !!!

recentChanges: 20 new levels!
Chapter 110 Ancient Remains
Trix motioned to the heads poking in and out from the trees. "It's like they're watching us."
"They once lived in this forest's protector, a giant tree spirit," Jenni explained.
"Why can't just go back home and leave us alone?" Trix retorted.
They came upon a huge tree stump, riches spilling out of its hollowed center. "The bandits cut it down for the treasures that grew within," Jenni said.
"Oh no!" cried Trix. "We need to stop those bandits!"

comments: When you get to 40 you can not go any further unless friends help. To me this is a bad thing to do because some people delete the game. I asked my friends and they done delete it also.

It was great UNTIL at level 180 I connected to Facebook and LOST EVERYTHING!!! All my boosters and things I had collected since the beginning. Even said connect to Facebook so you don't lose your progress. Makes me want to delete the whole app!!!!

This app keeps me wanting to find out what the next level has waiting ahead. I some times find my self having hours passing by me and not even know that the time has already passed by and even though I have realized that the time has passed by I stillI keep playing.
Just shouldn't have to pay so much so I only gave a 4 star. My only problem is it cost to much to go to the next level and to many days to wait if you're not on Facebook.
I like this game as a pastime. But the fact that we have purchase the gold bars we earned is killing the vibe. Do something and I'd give you five stars.
Very addicting game. Could use more ways to get extra lives cuz some levels are hard as hell !!

descriptionHTML:
Pyramid Solitaire Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

Challenge awaits you in this magical Solitaire game.

Join Helena and her loyal companion Kingsley on their journey to reveal the wonders of the Ancient World.

Find the clues by catching the Scarabs hidden beneath the Cards. You can match a Card that is one greater or lower than the one on your deck.

Catch the running Scarabs and uncover clues to help you on your journey and reveal the long-hidden treasures and magic of the Ancients.

Complete each episode to reveal a hidden treasure and transport to magical new worlds on a quest to reignite Khepri's prophecy.

Explore the lost places of the world where epic adventures await you in The Hidden Tomb, The Emerald Dream and beyond!

Take on this Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score! 

Pyramid Solitaire Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Pyramid Solitaire Saga features:
• Experience a new way of playing Solitaire with rich and exotic graphics set in Ancient Times
• Transport to magical new worlds with Helena the Treasure Hunter and Kingsley the cunning gerbil
• Powerful boosters to help with challenging levels
• Journey through exciting levels to unlock boosters and hidden treasures!
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master 
• Hundreds of adventurous levels to complete – more to come!
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
• Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet
• Available to play on mobile and tablet devices

Already a fan of Pyramid Solitaire Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news: 
facebook.com/PyramidSolitaireSaga
twitter.com/PyramidSaga

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Pyramid Solitaire Saga!

title: Pyramid Solitaire Saga

comments: This game is very hanging my mobile another games are good  speed but this game is  no speed  improve this game

Dear team, It's really a awesome game ever. I'm playing it since 2 years. Very addictive. But i request you to all, when we start a TEAM RACE many players join clans for playing team race n take efforts in team race for getting better reward but many of them team leaders kick players just before ending the team race n players won't receieve any reward for it. It was happened with me 2 times. So please do any update for those players who take much efforts in team war and then also they get nothing. Thanks

This game used to be 5 star. They've changed it where all team events are gem sucks. You have no chance of winning without using a considerable amount of gems. They've taken away most in game free ways to get gems, and to buy them is not worth it, they're very over priced. It's not a team event, it's a paid for event. If they change it and make it more fair for everyone I'll make a new rating.

It's a nice game with so many awesome monsters. I like it and it's my favourite game in this category. My suggestion is that if you can include an option to cancel ongoing breeding by giving gold or gems or without anything, it would have been better. The game has events that comes very frequently, it helps so much in getting new monsters and or progressing in the game.

The game is awesome! The game play, the monsters, and also the actual fighting and graphics. This is one of my most rated games and my most played; I couldn't go a day without it. It's competition is so good online with people and in dungeons and the map, also team wars are fun with your friends. Get this game you'll never regret it.

DO NOT PAY FOR ANYTHING IN THIS GAME. Recently my account was reset due to the game posting the wrong price of gems. I have lost everything even the things I paid full price for. I have been robbed of gems, cells, gold, food and my time. If you do play the game, don't spend actual money because they can take it all away. BE CAREFUL

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time updates!

Battle with the ultimate monster fighting force to lead them to victory in Monster Legends! Breed, feed, raise and train Legendary monsters and turn them into beasts!

Collect mighty monsters to uncover unique skills and boost your strategy in action packed battles. Build a world for your monsters to live, fill it with habitats and breed new species! Take your monsters on exciting quests and fighting games full of strategy. Only then will you be able to prove yourself a Monster Master!

If you’re all about multiplayer games, you’ll love Team Wars, where you’ll be able to duel other Monster Masters and win magnificent rewards and War Coins you can use to collect the exclusive monsters in the Team Shop.

Join your friends and connect with a Monster Community of over 60 million players. Start building, collecting and battling today! Monster Legends is a beast of an action game!

MONSTER LEGENDS FEATURES

BREED & COLLECT – UNIQUE MONSTERS AWAIT
- Collect over 400 monsters: New monsters are added to the game every week!
- Breed monsters of different elements and rarities to create cool new species!

BATTLE LEGENDARY MONSTERS
- Collect incredible monsters of all types in limited-time events!
- Fight in special events made of wonders and dangers packed with role playing action and unknown monster adversaries.
- Collect treasures and rewards in your quest to glory.

STRATEGY-BASED RPG FIGHTING GAME
- RPG progression to level up your monsters and power them up for the battles ahead.
- Your monsters will become stronger as you rank them up in the Monster Lab and equip them with runes!
- Set your monster teams strategically, combining the attackers, tanks and effect monsters that work best together
- Battle games will require strategy and tactics if you want to rise to the top of the rankings!

MULTIPLAYER BATTLES!
- Duel other Monster Masters in the PvP Mode, earn trophies and climb up the leaderboards. The higher you are at the end of the season, the better your rewards!
- Fight in the Multiplayer Mode each season for trophies, rewards, and a chance to reach the Legendary Leagues and become the Legendary Leader!
- The monsters in your Defense Team will need to be strong to protect your trophies from being stolen by other Monster Masters.
- Team Wars are the ultimate Multiplayer Games: Join or start a team, build a strategy with other players and obtain exclusive monsters from the Team Shop!
- Team up with your friends, fight and measure your battle strategy and strength against other players.

BUILD A MONSTER PARADISE!
- Build a Monster Paradise and fill it with everything you need: A Breeding Mountain, Habitats, Temples, and more!
- Unlock special spots in the islands, like the Library, the Temples of the Guardians, and the Monster Lab!

Are you brave and skillful enough to fight for your chance to become the #1 Monster Master in the world? Find out with Monster Legends, the action RPG that will put you in charge of a monster empire!

Download today and start training your monsters!

Check Monster Legends out on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonsterLegends
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Monster_Legends
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/MonsterLegendsGame

Other great titles by Social Point: Dragon City, World Chef and Dragon Land. Check them out!

Monster Legends is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

If you love your monsters, make them smile. Drop us a nice review here!

comments: I feel inlove with the game the second I opened it! being a huge naruto fan I had high expectations! and most of them were met.  I have two issues! it's seems the only way to get hero fragments is through the shops which is only 10 at a time. or special attack missions which keep changing! makes it very hard to awaken shinobi.  also why only 8 chapters in story mode! You have a whole two anime to base off and we only get 8 chapters! how disappointing.

I am a little disappointed in the game right now. I saved up for the Jiriya banner which is supposed to have a higher drop rate, got one Jiriya card in a multi 10xs summon. I would like to know why that happened seeing as with every other banner I have ever pulled on had numerous cards for that shinobi, sometimes even the full kit minus an ult. I am not looking for an ultimate every time. But when I pull on a banner I would like the rate to actually be reasonable thank you very much.

Everything was working just fine until not long ago. All of a sudden, everytime I try to play any kind of mission on my android, a message will pop up saying, 'Due to an unknown error the game will return to the title screen'. It's been happening for over a week now, I've tried to reinstall but nothing works. Please fix.

4 days ago i was having a problem of playing missions. I couldnt start it because the screen showed "due to an unknown error the game is returning to the title screen". The issue was resolved yesterday and again today the same old stuff. Is this a joke going on with my account?

To BANDAI NAMCO... Just suggesting a few thought about this game. I've taken liken this game more than any other I played so far.  I just thought during the mission about the choosen characters. I think this game will be more stratigical if you can switch characters during the mission. It just doesn't make any sense if the main character you control died right away. Since in a story there's still a chance to turn the table on your side. Just like in Naruto series though their team captain may die the subordinates will carry their will and a chance to win. And in this game,  If the main character died the rest automatically dies though there's still a lot of spare life. Hope you call consider.  Just making suggestion. Your AWESOME making this game BANDAI NAMCO.

I really like this game, the only reason im giving it a 1 star. Is because I've tried to send them a message involving an issue but I cant seem to find the way to do it. In regards to the issue I hope they see this message and fix it, for some reason it wont let me do any missions. I have updated it and deleted the cache but the problem persist.

descriptionHTML:
The characters from TV animes BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS and NARUTO SHIPPUDEN are finally united in NARUTO X BORUTO!

Create your very own fortress, then attack rival fortresses! Defend your base with strategic and deadly traps while you raid enemy bases with your friends for resources and honor!
Experience a brave new style of ninja battle:
a fusion of action and strategy!

--------------------------
■Game Overview
--------------------------

[Characters]
All your favorite characters are joining the battle, including Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, Kakashi Hatake, and Sakura Haruno from NARUTO SHIPPUDEN,
along with Boruto Uzumaki
from BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS!

[Action]
Simple controls that let you perform blazing fast combo attacks and all types of Ninjutsu!
All the heroic action you expect from NARUTO and BORUTO, using beautiful graphics, including powerful Ninjutsu attacks such as Naruto Uzumaki's Rasengan, and Ninjutsu power-ups like Sasuke Uchiha's Sharingan!


[Strategy]
Position traps and the Shinobi that you've trained
to protect your village from other players' attacks, all while
creating your very own ultimate fortress!

[Battle Rankings]
Compete for Battle Rankings by attacking and protecting fortresses. Try to get the
highest ranking by competing with players from all over the country!

[Multi-Player]
Online multi-player missions also available!
Team up with a maximum of 4 players and defeat mighty enemies!

A wonderful game to have very fun and exciting install right away you won't regret it. I've reached level 1049. It is super exciting to me learning how to Ricochet the balls off the walls. The projection of the angle need it. This is my all-time favorite and I highly recommend it to my friends and family. Plus, the little bit of flaws and the enemies within the game, will have you taking a break and coming back for more. Just know that I've deleted this game twice but always came back to it because this game , is fun and challenging .  If you don't like a challenge you won't like this game .  Just so you know , it does not require internet, to be able to play this game like others. Technicians please put out more games that don't need the Internet to play. This game is one of them. Just know that option is super helpful. We need more games able to be played without internet intervention. Ty taking time to read this. Have fun a Poppin. LOL

Not bad, not great. Randomly stops in the middle of play and you lose a life. Also takes a long time to load and to move to the next level. Okay for free, but if I paid for it I would be asking four a refund.  Update: I've contacted the developers multiple times. They keep sending the same canned response.  Game crashes frequently. Frustrating when you are just about to finish a level. Uninstalling.

I use to give this a 5 star rating until I lost all of my panda belt progress when I updated, 5 days ago. I sent a report to you and got a message that said there was a problem with the update. I'm still waiting for an answer on when this will be fixed. I refuse to play any levels or specisls, like badboon lair until I can receive the panda belt credits. If I don't receive the panda belt credits or if I am not credited for the points that I lost I will uninstall this game!!!!!

I loved this game and have played it for a few years now. I would have given it 5 stars, but for the last few months, it just closes on me mid play and I lose on my progress, as well as any items and special powers that I used to advance in a level. Very frustrating to lose items and have to start all over on the level.

Fun until paytowin players zero you out, over, and over, again. EDIT: Now lost my account, back to level one. Say goodbye to me and my wallet. Never again.

Fun . yeah takes time but can gain a lot of fast forward building/research/upgrade tokens simply playing heaps to do only time I seem to not be able to play is when I have an upgrade more then 12 hours or so but that doesn't stop he game from being played awesome game for a game involving real world time waiting with a spin, you have other things in game to do while you wait .

comments: WARNING: IF YOU DO NOT CORRECTLY SELECT POWERS BEFORE APPROVING, YOU LOSE THE POWER(S) YOU SHOULD HAVE RECEIVED! ALSO, DO NOT USE YOUR CRYSTAL SKULLS TO POWER UP, USE THEM TO EVOLVE! If you like One Piece, you'll like this game. The One Piece story line is faithfully adapted to the plot of the game (not exact, but great for a game story line). The characters are great. If you are patient and power up your characters, you don't have to pay to play. Basically no advertisement,  except for self promotion of the game.

Whether you are a fan of One Piece of not, this is an awesome game. Lots of fun, great and faithful art, and a rich combat. Best of all, they practically cram gems down your throat so you never feel forced to actually have to buy any.  An update to this is that I have been playing this game for years, so it is nice to see them keeping it fresh and fun. Still love this game. And as always, anni is the planni for my fellow Redditors.

This game is so fun collecting all the characters and trying to evolve them. Over the years I've had multiple phones so the only downside is the saving of data I wish it would just be connected to your account like most other games in case you lose or break your phone. Rather than having to start over is they can fix that issue this game is one of the best on the app store.

I have always loved onepeice and liked brave frontier very much so it's the best of both world's if you have ever beenm waiting for a one piece rpg then this is it. And grinding for items could of not been anymore fun than this. Still having fun with this game. And it's still getting better and better. Thank you for a perfect one-piece game. Also I normally hate grinding for items but when you live one piece like I do then it's doesn't matter. They also update the game with new content making it even better. 2018 and the game is still going strong.

Good for a One Piece fan! The many aspects of the game makes it interesting. There can be a bit of a learning curve for new players, but the slight challenge is what makes it fun. The updates and changes keep the game from becoming dull as well. Btw I have fun playing even as a free player because they are pretty generous with the game currency. You just need patience as with any game you play for free.

Game is fun overall. But get ready to grind after a week or so. Gems comes pretty easy overtime. But the prize in the store is a bit pricy especially when you are never guarantee the characters you want in the draw. So if you are not in a hurry. Save up your gems until they have a event with a guarantee 10th draw or something that has a character you want. Other than that, this game is great time killer and I love playing this game while waiting on the animation renew.

comments: The game itself is wonderful, but I've had this bug ever since Chapter 2 or 3 (I just finished Chapter 12) where when I finish the final level, the screen goes black and won't play the cutscene. I end up having to close the game and never get to see it, then I go into the next Chapter not really knowing what's going on. The story is important to me and it's very unfortunate that this is happening. A fix from the developers or a suggestion on something I can do would be greatly appreciated.

Really enjoy this game.  Just wish we could pay for land expansions because they don't come fast enough.  Running out of room to place everything.  Yes they have the cargo ship but you lose points for doing that.

I play whenever I can. Very Enjoyable!  Love both searching scenes and decorating my island. Love being able to rearrange, and I wish I could move the gifts I receive.  Don't like waiting the 4 hours to regain energy and I would gladly watch ads to be able to fill my energy. It would be nice to have a larger expansion area while needing the same requirements. Love the speciality collections!  Great job!

In one of the recent updates, the timers to receive flowers messed up.  Purchased the passenger car and I'm on the fourth day so far. It counts down, but just before it finishes, another day is added.
Game is too slow to progress. You find the clues, you get the flowers but you have to spend DAYS to get stars to progress!
Energy Bar drains too quickly. Other than this very cool game.

descriptionHTML:
A hidden object game for story lovers everywhere

Discover June’s Journey, the brand new hidden object game from the makers of Pearl’s Peril. Find hidden clues and solve exciting puzzles across beautiful locations that draw you right into the heart of the mystery!
Surprises at every turn, stunning hand drawn scenes, and a cast of glamorous characters await you in a globetrotting story game. From the heart of 1920s America to the perfect style of Paris and beyond, enjoy a story unlike anything you’ve seen before.
With every new chapter, you’ll sink into a world of thrilling mystery and exciting drama in a story to take you around the world.
Take a break from the stresses of life, and dive into a mystery game like no other.

*MORE THAN JUST A MYSTERY!*
FROM THE MAKERS OF PEARL’S PERIL – The follow-up to the hit hidden object game played by over 90 million fans
THRILLING PUZZLES – Hidden object scenes, jigsaw puzzles and loads of exciting modes. Which is your favourite?
MODERN WOMEN – Join June, a brave adventurer in a mystery game you’ll love
TRAVEL THE WORLD – See some of the most beautiful places in the world, all lovingly hand captured from the 1920s
ALL-NEW EPISODES – Just like your favourite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new chapter
HUGE CAST – Lose yourself in the wild and wonderful characters of June's Journey, but watch your every step!
Opening with the mysterious disappearance of her sister, June must take her orphaned niece under her wing. Together, they get drawn into a mystery greater than anyone ever expected. Can you uncover the real secret behind June’s Journey?

Discover the follow-up to the smash hit hidden object game, Pearl’s Peril, and uncover June’s Journey today!

---------------------------------------------------------------
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Like us on: facebook.com/wooga
June’s Journey is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
You may require an Internet connection to play June’s Journey and access its social features. June’s Journey may also contain advertising.

comments: Why is the game shutting down every single time I try to go to a neighbors farm?!? I click to go to the next neighbor & it shuts down with no warning & takes me back to my home screen & I have to reopen the app... 3/16- sick & TIRED of this app closing when I try going to neighbor farms!!!!!!! So tired of this app closing... Will increase stars once bug fixed. Friends are quitting due to this plus all the items costing RC... Game seems to care more about those who can pay to play... Sad...

What did you guys do! I opened the game and was told to update so I did. When I opened the game it took me all the way back to the beginning. I lost everything.all the coins, all the work I did on the islands. Don't know wat your programmer's did. But it pissed me off. I will not start over.i enjoyed the game played it for years. 700+ days played without interruption.

Very addictive! Some of the missions are impossible to finish without using your real money. Would recommend but with a warning: don't get your hopes up! Takes a very very vey vey long time to make progress if you don't use real money...

I can't believe you wouldn't offer an update to access this app? We the collective have spent hundred of dollars over the course of time. Your suggestion to contact fun plus?? We've been told that Android does not have an update available? Neither can I access the game on my fire. I've spent money throughout 115 levels. I'm sick to my stomach.

The game app opens and closes immediately on my iPad, my Amazon tablet and my Android phone. This started to happen at 12:01 CST today  What's going on. I spent a lot of money and if I can't play I want refunds.

descriptionHTML:
Beautiful and fun farming simulation game. Raise cute farm animals and harvest diverse crops to make your farm a success! It's up to you to make your dream farm by the seaside. Start building your dream farm now.

■■ Game Features ■■
✓ Played by over 60 million people all around the world!
✓ Tired of upgrading the Barn? Enjoy unlimited Barn space.
✓ Prepare more than 400+ dishes in the kitchen.
✓ Plant, harvest and produce over 200+ unique products!
✓ Compete with other farmers in the new Farm Beauty Contest!
✓ Daily orders and new missions added regularly for more fun!
✓ 500+ unique, cute, and well-designed decorations!
✓ Adopt pets and costume them with pet apparel and equipment. Now you can breed pets to make new baby pets!
✓ Exotic Island Farm: Explore a Mine, Garden!
✓ Marine Sea Resort: You are now the owner of the Sea Resort! Complete resort orders and build the best resort for visitors to come to!
✓ Visit neighbors' farms and sample their newest dishes to earn prizes, help clean decorations, and trade for needed farm products!

Family Farm Seaside supports 21 languages including; English, Arabic, Dutch, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian Bokmål, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

※ Product Usage Details
- Recommended Specifications: CPU Quad core 2.3GHz, Ram 2GB
- Minimum Specifications: CPU Quad core 1.5GHz, Ram 1GB

※ Access permission notice for gameplay

comments: Warning! Once you start playing Angry Birds Match you'll never want to stop! I love this game. I have been looking for a game that isn't so easy I get bored or too hard I get angry! This game is perfect! The only thing I would like is could you possibly offer other ways to get more lives? Like watch a video to fill up ( like angry birds pop) or spin the wheel? I just hate waiting soooo long when I run out of lives, because I want to keep playing!!!!

I've enjoyed this game, but I haven't been able to open it for several days. I hate to uninstall and lose all my progress. Any help would be appreciated. Ok, so after about a month of not loading it started working...for a month now it's down again. I upgraded today, 2/19, and still won't open, grrrr! Help!! Changed my 5 stars to 1! The game constantly freezes, closes and then won't reload. I've reinstalled 4 times and that's it I'm done. Really disappointing as when it runs it's so much fun.
For some reason right in the middle of playing it has been quitting and then I lose that life. Very frustrating. Is there and update available?

I love this game but for like 3 months since i updated I can't play and I just updated again and still the same doesn't let the game download it frozes, can you please fix that, or let me know what i can do, I dont want to uninstall it so I don't loose my progress.  Starting to get aggravated.  Thank you.

I like this game a lot and would give higher reviews but a lot of times if I am playing a level and have one move left it ends the level and I never get to make the move. It's some kind of glitch in the game. I think it's trying to get me to buy gems and coins. Very frustrating and annoying.
It seems to me that the objects to move are too small, it is always moving wrong way that I am trying to move. You should be able to select move by tapping, then swipe.

descriptionHTML:
Match the toys, stars, stuff and things to collect everything those cute baby birds from the Angry Birds Movie ask for! Because who can say no to a face like that?

The pigs are trying their hardest to ruin the Hatchlings’ party, but nothing can stop these little guys! Of course not without some help from the big birds. Red, Chuck, and Bomb are there to help the Hatchlings whenever they get into trouble... which is pretty often. It’s going to take a lot of matching, a wide variety of outfits, and heaps of help from you too, but we just might be able to get this party started!

comments: Fun and entertaining game, with easy class switching. Inventory space is an issue early game, but once you start getting daily challenges, you can use up trash drops after every level.  The controls could do with some work, but overall, still a well-made game.

Everything works so well and after level 11 there is so much to play that it do not feel right to complain but I will anyway. Every character has same face. Most of time it do not tough matter under all the clothes. I would have just wanted long white beard or something. Maybe later there is change for that too? I am still just on level 12.

I was in love with this game, until my game stopped saving. Game keeps telling me im not online. 15045816. Yes devs this review is for you. I have tried a multitude of work aroubds. Have you had trouble in the past with corrupted saves or syncing issues ?
Rpg simple yet nostalgic of old fantasy games like Diablo. Not overly time needy, but always something to do if you need a time waster.
Game is pretty good. I just wish instead of relying on gold and gems they should add a dragon gem you can earn in game to help upgrade your character for people who can't afford to use real money.

Awesome game. The only problem i have with it is the fact that my character is a level 20 and i still can't join a guild, which should be available at level 17.  Other then that it is just such a kick a$$ game i still have it all 5 stars.
