Monsters and dragons roam the realm, and your friends have already picked up the gauntlet, bow and arrow as well as sorcerer hats to raid dungeons, gain fame, and fight warlocks in the arena against other guilds!Guild of Heroes delivers everything the classic fantasy has to offer, with devious dwarves and ancient elves, nasty orc shamans and troll sorcery, epic action and dark caves, quests and raids as befits the best medieval style RPG in the lineage of tabletop games.However, the epic journey through the huge, colorful game world is not only fairy tales of mystic dungeons and dragons, but also battle against mages in the arena, controlled by other players!In a nutshell:‚òÖ Action-packed fantasy RPG in best game graphics‚òÖ Equip character classes such as mage, hunter and warrior, interchangeable at any time‚òÖ PVP against other teams in arena guild wars‚òÖ Craft medieval weapons and armor with hundreds of combinations‚òÖ Thousands of different monsters from diabolic exorcists to ... oh, discover for yourself!Now, enough of the heroic ballads; grab your wand, sword and shield, and into the best, free fantasy RPG you'll ever experience!Oh, do not forget: Follow the Guild of Heroes Community on Facebook - Events, Fan Art, Guild Friends and Contests are waiting to be explored!
descriptionHTML:
Heed the call of the magicians guild - conjurers, witches, archers and templars are needed! Monsters and dragons roam the realm, and your friends have already picked up the gauntlet, bow and arrow as well as sorcerer hats to raid dungeons, gain fame, and fight warlocks in the arena against other guilds!

Guild of Heroes delivers everything the classic fantasy has to offer, with devious dwarves and ancient elves, nasty orc shamans and troll sorcery, epic action and dark caves, quests and raids as befits the best medieval style RPG in the lineage of tabletop games.

However, the epic journey through the huge, colorful game world is not only fairy tales of mystic dungeons and dragons, but also battle against mages in the arena, controlled by other players!

In a nutshell:
★ Action-packed fantasy RPG in best game graphics
★ Equip character classes such as mage, hunter and warrior, interchangeable at any time
★ PVP against other teams in arena guild wars
★ Craft medieval weapons and armor with hundreds of combinations
★ Thousands of different monsters from diabolic exorcists to ... oh, discover for yourself!

Now, enough of the heroic ballads; grab your wand, sword and shield, and into the best, free fantasy RPG you'll ever experience!

Oh, do not forget: Follow the Guild of Heroes Community on Facebook - Events, Fan Art, Guild Friends and Contests are waiting to be explored!

comments: The match making system could be improved. Match making is based on your level but does not take into account the level of the ship. To test this I took a Heavy Fighter At level 11 and was being matched up with Frigates. No chance in heck to win for me. Even at higher levels it's hard to win if your opponent has a ship 3-4 steps above you. A limit of 2 levels above and below for ships would be a good fix.

A truly enjoyable game with a few simple strategies that somewhat take the fun away.   For instance, warp drives have a big chance of putting you behind the other guy where your thrusters and generators usually are(it's more or less game over if they get destroyed). If you go for a laser heavy they'll have no way of defending since they can't put armor and thrusters and shields don't block lasers.   Also you can't name your ship which is a bit of a missed opportunity

I also liked the game more at lower levels. Maybe you could make it like a loss drops your rating by so many points. I hit lvl 130 and barely win a fight with either of the three of my ships. If we could drop points, maybe we could get 3 straight wins or 5 a day. The higher the rank, obviously means harder opponents. But my ships are only so strong while saving up money to by better upgrades or a better ship. Please fix this

Great game, really fun gameplay. The feature of being able to earn up to ~50 celestium (in game paid currency) by playing the game and doing daily achievements is really good. Only gripe is that there is no confirmation button for spending celestium leading to accidently spending it at a miss-tap and no way to undo these purchases. Other than that very good.

This game if fun....but after trying a couple of the free offers to gain in game currency and never receiving the funds I will be uninstalling. I contacted fyber(the ad company that gives out the currency) and they say they gave the compensation. I cannot support a game that blatantly states that funds may not be awarded and still uses the fraud company. It is a great disservice to the player base and I will not stand for it

Fun concept and decently executed. So much so players don't see the pay to win till you get to level 10 ( the black market is locked till then). The items inside the black market take cash currency in large quantities. And even though you can earn the cash currency, the amount is petty and will take forever to stack up.  Though I can't see people popping in the large quantities of cash to be on top in this game, the possibility exists. Especially when most free to play games have players who are in house ( employees and other sources) and get damn near unlimited in game currency to force the public to invest into the game to compete for top ratings and bragging rights...

comments: Updated This game has become about how much time and MONEY you can spend on it. They don't care about issues in game or what feed back they get. There are hundreds of issues that don't get addressed they just add more and more content hope people ignore the issues. Thed new content creates new issues and in some cases makes old issues worse

Don't bother. Pay players only do well. And it's expensive! Devs have it programmed for pay players so you fall far behind and can't catch up. They match you against pay players that are always stronger. Contests are extremely difficult. Been playing for 2 years so I know what I'm commenting about.

Ever since the new owners took over, content has lessened. Although new heroes appear, it is all about money scams and contests. Turned down drop rates make it nearly impossible to upgrade with dropping piles of cash.
Used to be a fun game with silly characters and lots to do. Since sold by per blue game quality has plummeted. Deleted and moved on to other games that run smoother and appreciate customer feedback.
The text in game as become tiny almost unreadable since last update. Am I the only one? I'm playing on galaxy S8.

One of my accounts was stolen, I had it connected to FB, Google & Email, I have gotten an email asking for things they need to verify, I sent what I could, name, server, etc, I also sent pics of the name it was when I had it and the name they changed it to, also the guild name, still not heard a thing back? It can't be that hard to get it back, I known a few ppl working in the gaming area, and they say it's pretty easy that you guys probably could care less, as long as you get your money...I really like playing it, I've put money into it, but security is horrible if I can have it connected to 3 things, yet someone can still steal it???.....Very disappointed now.

descriptionHTML:
Battle dragons and monsters in DragonSoul, the epic fantasy RPG stuffed with amazing heroes, legendary monsters and fantastic loot!

Battle online to earn legendary heroes and power-up to brawl your way through multiple fantasy game modes. Roleplay through the many Campaign chapters, test your skills against real DragonSoul players in PvP battles, and take a break from your quest to battle in the Boss Pit! Even team up with other players by joining a multiplayer Guild!

With all new heroes, gear and maps to grind, DragonSoul is a ridiculously fun and epic role playing adventure!

DragonSoul Features:

Strategy RPG with Over-the-Top Battles!
+ Collect and choose your 5 best heroes to wage war against monsters, dragons and even other players online
+ Roleplaying games and campaign battles come with a ridiculously epic twist
+ Strategy is key to beating tougher and stronger opponents!

Battle in Weekly ‘Guild Wars’ Fighting Games!
+ RPG fighting games give you a shot at squaring off against other players
+ Battle dragons and other amazing creatures in updated challenges
+ Multiplayer RPG games allow you to compete against other players for top ranks, prizes and bragging rights

Epic Heroes & Powerful Runes!
+ Heroes have at least 4 deadly skills and 14 rarity levels
+ Collect Heroes to build the ultimate lineup
+ Battle with awesome gear like Laser Kittens, Enchanted Elbow Pads and Lucky Orc’s Foot
+ Legendary heroes get even stronger with the addition of Runes

Battle Dragons & Legendary Monsters!
+ Battle dragons and monsters by fighting in combats
+ Monster RPG becomes real! Strategize with your heroes to battle your monsters in this RPG
+ Heroes clash with epic monsters in battles like you've never seen with unique & awesome gear

Epic Hero Quest!
+ Battle dragons and monsters as you collect Soulstones to free and unlock Heroes from the clutches of the evil dragon, Umlaut!
+ Roleplaying as five main heroes; you’ll battle dragons and grab rare loot

Amazing Graphics!
+ Explore a rich fantasy world filled with gorgeous environments, hilarious characters, astounding effects, and stunning graphics.

Long ago, fearless heroes ruled the land with mighty powers. Then the jealous dragon Umlaut captured the heroes, trapping them in Soulstones. Now, only few heroes remain. Only YOU can take the remaining few on a journey from a scrappy band and turn it into an unstoppable army as you unlock Soulstones in each battle. Explore an original world with fantastic characters while fighting your way to the top, freeing heroes and defeating evil along the way!

Fantasy RPG games will never be the same! Battle with your legendary heroes and become the best in this monster RPG!

Download DragonSoul today!

DragonSoul is available in multiple languages, including: Spanish, French, German, Russian, Italian, Turkish, Portuguese, Dutch, Danish, Japanese, Korean, Chinese and Indonesian.

descriptionHTML:
Monster Busters is a fun match-3 puzzle game for all ages. Match same colored monsters to save the gingerbread cookie friends! Enjoy each and every stage with entertaining challenges.
Install the best match-3 puzzle game to your mobile device & start the adventure today!


Be a Hero to Save Your Friends

Anyone could be a hero saving the gingerbread friends captured in the monster tower. Not so scary but actually cute-looking monsters have taken away your friends while they were playing with you! No worries though cause they’ve got a brave friends to save them. And it’s you! Let’s go climb up the monster tower to find your friends back.


Play with Your Loving Ones

A game for all ages you can play with your grandmother, father, children, of course your friends, and all other loving ones. Play and talk about Monster Busters while you’re spending time together. Not only that you can meet with new friends from all over the world!


All Alive Characters

You can see your own avatar move up and down the monster tower, and unlike most other games, even the characters you’re fighting against are all alive to add up the extra fun and lively energy in game. It’s very unique and fun finding your own strategy for each character to win the missions too! Missions that are challenging but absolutely doable.

descriptionHTML:
Build, collect and quest with your favorite Family Guy heroes and villains in a freakin’ hilarious new sandbox game!

Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!

After another epic battle with the giant chicken, Peter Griffin has accidentally destroyed Quahog! Play for FREE and rally your favorite FG characters (even Meg) to save the city in a hilarious new adventure from the writers of Family Guy. Or don’t, and regret it forever! 

Quest for Stuff Features: 

• It’s Free! Freakin’ free? Freakin’ sweet! 
• Build a living Quahog that fits enjoyably in your pants 
• Collect hilarious outfits for your characters like Mermaid Peter, Bikini-Clad Quagmire, and Rambo Lois 
• Quest with FG characters and win ridiculous prizes
• Defend Quahog from pirates, evil chickens, and other invasions 
• Peterfy your town with decorations such as The Petercopter, The Peterdactyl, and The Hindenpeter 
• Collect hundreds of brand new and classic animations 

Build a city with Peter Griffin and all of your favorite Family Guy characters! What could possibly go wrong?

PS: You can play this game in French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, and Brazilian Portuguese! 

PPS: Don’t forget to watch new episodes of Family Guy on Sundays - only on FOX! 

Check out all the latest news & updates for Family Guy: The Quest for Stuff: 
• Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/playfamilyguy 
• Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/playfamilyguy 
• Follow Peter on Instagram: www.instagram.com/peterpumpkineater69 
• Check out awesome Family Guy clips, episodes, pictures, and more: www.fox.com/family-guy

recentChanges: Peter and Lois are opening up a food truck! But will a falling out between the two and a competition to put the other out of business tear their family apart?
Serve up requested dishes to hungry customers!
Consult culinary gurus like Guy Fieri!
It's out of the frying pan, into the fire when there's "Too Many Griffins in the Kitchen"!

title: Family Guy The Quest for Stuff

description: Grow Empire: Rome is a captivating game, mixing tower defense (TD) and strategy mechanisms with role playing (RPG) elements.You are Caesar, mighty leader of the Roman republic, your objective is to defeat other civilizations in ancient Europe with an army made-up of roman soldiers, siege weapons, heroes and barbarian mercenaries. Be ready for War!Turn a small republic in the heart of the Italian peninsula into the greatest civilization the world has ever seen. Lead a bunch of weak peasants into the fierceness of battle to turn them into invincible warriors.Upgrade your stronghold to defend from the most fearful barbarian's clans and armies from Italy, Gallium, Carthage and Iberian peninsula. Conquer them to expand your dominions and see your nation wealth grows.The glory is awaiting for you Caesar!Veni Vidi Vici!Features:‚Ä¢ Tower Defense (TD), Strategy and Role Playing (RPG) elements.‚Ä¢ +1400 waves to survive.‚Ä¢ +100 cities to conquer in ancient Europe.‚Ä¢ +1000 buildings upgrades.‚Ä¢ +35 different Roman troops to research and unlock.‚Ä¢ 4 European enemy factions, each with +12 different troops.‚Ä¢ Siege weapons and war elephants!‚Ä¢ 4 heroes with special skills.‚Ä¢ +18 Skills to unlock.
descriptionHTML:
Grow Empire: Rome is a captivating game, mixing tower defense (TD) and strategy mechanisms with role playing (RPG) elements.
You are Caesar, mighty leader of the Roman republic, your objective is to defeat other civilizations in ancient Europe with an army made-up of roman soldiers, siege weapons, heroes and barbarian mercenaries. Be ready for War!

Turn a small republic in the heart of the Italian peninsula into the greatest civilization the world has ever seen. Lead a bunch of weak peasants into the fierceness of battle to turn them into invincible warriors.
Upgrade your stronghold to defend from the most fearful barbarian's clans and armies from Italy, Gallium, Carthage and Iberian peninsula. Conquer them to expand your dominions and see your nation wealth grows.

The glory is awaiting for you Caesar!
Veni Vidi Vici!

Features:
• Tower Defense (TD), Strategy and Role Playing (RPG) elements.
• +1400 waves to survive.
• +100 cities to conquer in ancient Europe.
• +1000 buildings upgrades.
• +35 different Roman troops to research and unlock.
• 4 European enemy factions, each with +12 different troops.
• Siege weapons and war elephants!
• 4 heroes with special skills.
• +18 Skills to unlock.
developerAddress: contact@gstationstudio.com
recentChanges: -New game mode with +300 levels.
-20 new cities to conquer.
-Bank gathers coins while offline.
-Better UI graphics.
-Added cards boosters.
summary: Grow Empire: Rome mix tower defense TD, strategy and role playing RPG elements.
title: Grow Empire: Rome

description: Conquerors is a grand strategy game set in the warring period of historical Arabia. Establish a foothold in the World by recruiting powerful Heroes, amassing a mighty army, and conquering Provinces with your Guild. With every village and fortress conquered, you are one step closer to ultimate rule of the Palace! ‚òÜRecruit Legendary Heroes‚òÜ Armed with powerful skills, Heroes are versatile elites. Have them lead sieges to take down enemy cities or garrison them to safeguard your own. Experiment with different Hero combinations and give yourself a strategic edge! ‚òÜA Rewarding Campaign‚òÜ Progress through the Campaign to get Heroes and Equipment! Don your Heroes in full gear for great power-ups! ‚òÜInnovative Troop System‚òÜ Newly trained troops start out as reinforcements, and can be assigned to other types (Cavalry, Infantry, Ranged Unit, or Siege Engine) based on your needs. ‚òÜGuild Action Galore‚òÜ Join a Guild and seek allies to fight in Skirmishes, Guild Wars, Province Battle, Palace Warfare, and World Invasion! Teamwork will be the key to success! ‚òÜProvince Battle‚òÜ Take over Provinces to earn your Guild rewards and bragging rights. Don‚Äôt overlook the NPC forces while you are focused on other players! Multitasking is a vital skill for success! ‚òÜPalace Conqueror‚òÜ No ruler is complete without a Palace of their own. Rise to be King, and enjoy privileges like renaming the World, and more! ‚òÜClash of Tactics‚òÜ Outwit your opponents in the weekly Arena season, and climb the tiers for spectacular rewards! ‚òÜThe World is Your Playground‚òÜ Freely migrate between Worlds to find one that suits your play style. Choose an emptier World to lie low and develop, or one packed with players to raid! ‚òÜUnique Style and Gameplay‚òÜ With a lavish Arabian theme filled with mystery and wonder, experience a fresh and unique style in both building and combat gameplay! ‚òÜYour Own City‚òÜ The foundation of a mighty army is a well-run city! Upgrade buildings, research Tech, train Troops, and promote Heroes to stay ahead!‚ÄªSUPPORT‚ÄªFacebook:  https://www.facebook.com/ConquerorsEN
descriptionHTML:
Conquerors is a grand strategy game set in the warring period of historical Arabia. Establish a foothold in the World by recruiting powerful Heroes, amassing a mighty army, and conquering Provinces with your Guild. With every village and fortress conquered, you are one step closer to ultimate rule of the Palace!

☆Recruit Legendary Heroes☆
Armed with powerful skills, Heroes are versatile elites. Have them lead sieges to take down enemy cities or garrison them to safeguard your own. Experiment with different Hero combinations and give yourself a strategic edge!

☆A Rewarding Campaign☆
Progress through the Campaign to get Heroes and Equipment! Don your Heroes in full gear for great power-ups!

☆Innovative Troop System☆
Newly trained troops start out as reinforcements, and can be assigned to other types (Cavalry, Infantry, Ranged Unit, or Siege Engine) based on your needs.

☆Guild Action Galore☆
Join a Guild and seek allies to fight in Skirmishes, Guild Wars, Province Battle, Palace Warfare, and World Invasion! Teamwork will be the key to success!

☆Province Battle☆
Take over Provinces to earn your Guild rewards and bragging rights. Don’t overlook the NPC forces while you are focused on other players! Multitasking is a vital skill for success!

☆Palace Conqueror☆
No ruler is complete without a Palace of their own. Rise to be King, and enjoy privileges like renaming the World, and more!

☆Clash of Tactics☆
Outwit your opponents in the weekly Arena season, and climb the tiers for spectacular rewards!

☆The World is Your Playground☆
Freely migrate between Worlds to find one that suits your play style. Choose an emptier World to lie low and develop, or one packed with players to raid!

☆Unique Style and Gameplay☆
With a lavish Arabian theme filled with mystery and wonder, experience a fresh and unique style in both building and combat gameplay!

☆Your Own City☆
The foundation of a mighty army is a well-run city! Upgrade buildings, research Tech, train Troops, and promote Heroes to stay ahead!

※SUPPORT※
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ConquerorsEN

description: Do you like exotic food? Are you more of a burger and fries kind of person? descriptionHTML:
Do you like exotic food? Are you more of a burger and fries kind of person? Either way, there’s a spot for you in the kitchens of World Chef, the most international cooking game, with chefs and recipes from over 20 nationalities!

World Chef is a happy place where the kitchen never closes, the waiter always has a big smile on his face and the food is so great you should probably play with a bib on.

Open your restaurant, give it a name and decorate it to your taste! Then start cooking world cuisines and serving customers! Your place will soon become so popular you’ll have to make it bigger!

Expand your menu with every new international chef: Tacos, pizza, sushi,... The whole world can fit inside one restaurant! The success ladder will lead you to welcoming VIP diners and even catering special events! You will soon master the art of running a top restaurant.

And remember! This is not a fast food joint, take your time to slow-cook your best recipes. Your customers know they will be worth the waiting.

----

FEATURES:
Create, decorate and run your own fine dining restaurant!
Craft exclusive decorations at the Design Studio.
Buy and trade fresh ingredients and cook increasingly delicious dishes.
Build yourself a dock, get a boat and start importing exotic ingredients!
Serve your finest cuisine to customers from all around the world.
Increase your popularity and see how all the VIPs become regulars!
----

World Chef is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

comments: Pay to win once you get to mid tier matchmaking. Fun still but some people de rank on purpose to fight people way below their character levels. Sometimes I get matched with people with 2 to 3 times my health and they also have more defense so it's as if they have even more plus can 2 shot me.

It's not stable while playing, it says all the time network issue but, My net speed has 75 Mbps, still having problems while playing this superb game.  Graphics is good Controllers are best.  During phone calls , we lose the match haha usually.

Good game  Except for the constant updates and also why when i use a breaker on someone(example i use laura shiba) and as she hits with her sword the strike move my opponent does still seems to overpower it..wheres the ethic in that? Lost many a battle due to this silly glitch..sort it out!! Once an attack has been made and is hitting the opponent regardless of priority moves it should still count!!

Good graphics. I really wish you could sell rangers and monsters that you don't want. It is way too unorganized for me having all these warriors with flashing buttons saying UPGRADE, when I don't want to waste my coins and crystals on warriors I'm never gonna fight with.

The controls are so bad and unresponsive that I routinely lose battles simply because it's not picking up my inputs. The gameplay is stupid from the fight mechanics to the stupid way you get characters. The game is made as a pay to win and that's just a terrible way to make a game. They keep saying performance enchanements in the updates and I'm just not seeing it. This game is purely a cash grab meant to take peoples money over nostalgia.

Its to much of a gamble. For example i had a match were i started of with block, defense, block. And my opponent had from the looks a breaker, breaker, attack. I got freaking trashed in seconds. Thats the biggest issue for me and like some people leaders are f@#$*** ridiculously powerful. Needs more balance

comments: This game is awesome. The girls are beautiful and the songs are nice. There are a couple of errors I be having with the game though. I would have liked if they had subtitles to the songs so we know what they are singing. Also give us a chance to earn more gems and scouting tickets.The scouting I think is also not fair. I would scout single ten times and not get anything but a rare. While my friends do single scouts and get ur and SSR. YOU won't get goods cards unless you pay or do the 11 scout. The pricings also could be improved

I like music game in general, it's hard to get the game right on mobile. but they manage to get it right here. The LP system prevent you to play continuesly unless you paid. But in my experience the amount is decent enough (this make you enjoy the music more since you dont have to restart to achieve perfection). The card mechanic is added bonus where you can spend hard earn cash. I can see people still enjoying the game without spending anything.

Warning! This game is freakin' addictive. Good graphic with cute characters. Recommended for anyone who loves idol genre ... Suggestion: please fix the lagging. The circle disappear sometimes during the live show. Sometimes the app even doesn't recognize my finger touch that makes me miss a circle. But overall. It's a good game  .... ALL HAIL PRINTEMPS AND GUILTY KISS

I love the game definitely but with the new update, it keeps telling me that there's a transmission error then when it went through and finished connecting, it said that the data transfer was successful. I haven't transfered anything to a new device or anything like that. The only options I'm given is to contact support and start a new game in which I definitely don't want to do. It isn't my connection because everything else on my phone that requires WiFi is fine and I can use it. Is this because of the new update?

I love the game and it's wonderful!!  But...  I had i don't know like a glitch or something.  When started to play the rhythm game while I playing suddenly the icon that I should press came faster all or a sudden. But the song is still OK.  After the glitch it becames back to normal.  This happen me for 3 times on the same day. Please fix it. And Thank you.

It's so addicting and a fabulous rhythm game. One thing I'm really picky on is that you press the circle on the beat and this is the only game so far that has stayed true to all the notes being on the EXACT beat. Other games don't do that and it bothers me to no end bc I don't know when to press but this game is great and I love it dearly. Also cute girls.

descriptionHTML:
A massive hit game app in Japan, now available worldwide!

Featuring Aqours and μ's from the Love Live! series, as well as game-original characters. Support the school idols and help them make their dreams come true!

Simple and fun to play. Just tap to the rhythm!

----- Original Rhythm Action ——
Live shows are performed by tapping the screen to the rhythm. Better timing can earn you higher scores. String combos together to gain even more points!

There are over 80 original songs to choose from.

----- Create Your Own Team ——
You can pick and create your own teams from Aqours, μ's and many more original members.

Create teams best suited to your favorite songs or events, or just with your favorite members. It's all up to you!

------Improve Your Members———
Improve your team members by "Practice." The better they get, the greater their performance scores will be!

When you "Special Practice" two of the same member, they become idolized with cuter costumes.

------Full Stories With the Official Anime Voice Actresses———
The main story is fully voiced by the original Aqours and μ's voice cast.

------Side Stories for Each Member———
Each and every member has their own story to tell. Deepen the bond with them to unlock the side stories.

Side stories of Aqours and μ's members are also fully voiced by the anime series voice cast!

***Recommended screen resolution***
640 by 360 pixels or higher

(This game is not supported on rooted devices.)

description: From the creators of Otome games for FREE with Ôºú32 million DLsÔºû comes the newest romance game, Lost Alice!Open the door of destiny to Wonderland. Let the classic characters of the immortal masterpiece, Alice‚Äôs Adventures in Wonderland, amaze you. Who will you choose to shape your future with?‚óÜABOUT LOST ALICE‚ÄúYou‚Äôve come here, neither following the White Rabbit nor in response to the Queen of Hearts.You‚Äôve come to Wonderland of your free will.‚Äù--The key to solving all the mysteries is your lost memories.‚ÄúMy Alice, I‚Äôve been waiting for you for so long.‚Äù‚ÄúI told you, I‚Äôm not Alice!‚Äù--You remember nothing but your name. They call you Alice.Elegant tea party with the Hatter. Temptations from the Cheshire Cat. The golden afternoon with Joker. descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Otome games for FREE with ＜32 million DLs＞ comes the newest romance game, Lost Alice!
Open the door of destiny to Wonderland. Let the classic characters of the immortal masterpiece, Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland, amaze you. Who will you choose to shape your future with?

◆ABOUT LOST ALICE
“You’ve come here, neither following the White Rabbit nor in response to the Queen of Hearts.
You’ve come to Wonderland of your free will.”
--The key to solving all the mysteries is your lost memories.
“My Alice, I’ve been waiting for you for so long.”
“I told you, I’m not Alice!”
--You remember nothing but your name. They call you Alice.
Elegant tea party with the Hatter. Temptations from the Cheshire Cat. The golden afternoon with Joker. While the days in Wonderland never cease to entertain you...you find your true love.
Whose “Alice” will you be?

◆WONDROUS MEN THAT WILL FALL IN LOVE WITH YOU:
Luke Estheim - The Hatter
“You don’t have to worry, about anything...”
This quiet and mysterious gentleman calls you by your name, not “Alice”, unlike the other residents of Wonderland. Luke keeps a secret, along with his sad yet passionate feelings for you...
His secret lies in your lost memories.

Kyle Knock - Cheshire Cat
“The only one I want to touch, to have smile at me is you, my Alice.”
Possessing a charming pair of cat ears and a tail, Kyle seduces you with a mesmerizing smile. He takes the role of the guide of Wonderland, while acting overly affectionate. You can’t understand the reasons behind it at first, but once you get to know why he had been waiting for an “Alice” more than anyone else, you will understand your feelings for him as well.

Joker Braze - Role unknown
“To think that we would be reunited here...it must be fate tying us together.”
Wielding magic with his playing cards and playing with others with his words, this badboy takes a liking to you and, before you know it, you must go on your adventure with him. As your bond deepens, you notice that Joker and you have something in common.

◆FEATURES:
*FREE to play!
*Read with Story Tickets, which will recover themselves automatically
*Cute avatars in Japanese anime style with constant updates
*NEW FEATURE! Go social with your avatar. ‘Snap & Post’ lets you show off your avatar’s style to other players and favorite the looks you love, so aim for the highest rank!
*Beautiful artwork, alluring soundtracks and motion effects
*Multiple endings depending on the choices you make
*In-game events frequently held with exclusive rewards and prizes
*Available ON FACEBOOK too!

◆HIGHLY RECOMMENDED IF YOU:
-Love romance novels or movies
-Love Japanese games, manga, novels or anime
-Are interested in dating sim games but have never had the chance to play
-Want to enjoy being in love with a variety of men
-Want to have a love affair without anyone knowing
-Love to read fantasy novels
-Are crazy about Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland and/or Through the Looking-Glass, and What Alice Found There
-Love romance games / dating games for free
-Love gothic / lolita fashion and dressing up your avatar
-Enjoy reading fiction with a grand setting

comments: The upgrades are too expensive, with no other source of income than just selling fishes that takes forever to grow (if they even grow to adult), and watching ads. I tried to make it work for a day but it's super hard to earn money for upgrades. Even watching ads give so little rewards. Uninstalling. So unfortunate because i really loved the PC version of this.

I gave Fish Tycoon 2 4 stars I have spent a lot of time playing this game, BUT, recently the daily rewards and rewards for task completion which include coins do not work.  You complete the task, you are told you are getting $200 added to you bank account, BUT your $ total does not change.  This makes it hard to get money to spend.  All you can do is breed and sell fish - which takes time.  I reported this and got a prompt response that they are sorry and that they were adding $ and Gems  to my account balances.  Nice, but my $ total did not change.  I did see an increase in my gems.  There is an update 2/21/18 hopefully this will improve some issues.

This app is good but need high battery consumption. I hope new upcoming update can reduce battery consumption. For everyone who complaint about money, just relax, breed your discovered expensive fish first and sell it till you have sufficient money. If you have much money you can discover more species freely in order to find magic fish. It's not about speed but it's about passion, strategy, trial error and patient.

Was kindly givwn replacment eggs and was told weak internet was the issue. Dont know how cause its a small apartment and never had an issue before. Anyway just lost my 3rd set of eggs so deleting for good dont waste your time folks

I have been playing this game for awhile as and I quite like it then the next day I tried to open it but it was stuck on half way when it loaded and it never went forward. Pls fix this and I'll rate it 5 stars.

I fell in love with these developers when I saw a co-worker playing Virtual Families.  It's so cute!  From there, I got into Virtual Villagers and Fish Tycoon.  This second release is better than the first, but it's still the same basic gameplay.  (tip: Don't buy uncommon eggs too early, or you'll be struggling with too many dying rare fish)

descriptionHTML:
** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! **

A note from the developer:

Hi there! I know you've been waiting a long time for the opportunity to become a bigger and better fish tycoon. I’m happy to tell you it’s your lucky day!! Now you can rediscover and explore the lost magic fish of Isola as you feed, breed, and sell your way from small time merchant to the ultimate aquatic entrepreneur!

Dive into a delightfully fishy adventure of a real-time virtual aquarium with over 400 unique and distinctive fish to discover: it’s an adorable fishtank mania!

Just like a real world, this one will be changing and growing along with the families of pet fish you collect and care for. The truth is, we are a small team and putting everything that we want into these games is not always possible. While you are discovering the world of Fish Tycoon 2: Virtual Aquarium, we’ll be investigating lots of new and exciting changes for the future. We hope to continue working on Fish Tycoon 2: Virtual Aquarium and making it more beautiful, more fun, and more real as the months go on.

Features:

Start with access to 400+ unique species of fish!
Unlock an array of useful upgrades and power-ups!
Renovate your storefront and reveal special surprises to expand your fish empire!
Nurture and cure your fish using magical plants and marine life!
Hire a colorful mascot to draw in the big crowds!
Decorate your tank with a plethora of gorgeous items!
Research advertising, environment and food to sustain rarer species and increase your revenue!

Check out our other hit games like Virtual Families, Virtual Villagers, and more! Bye!

Thanks for playing,
Arthur Humphrey
Lead Designer, Last Day of Work

comments: Had fun with my brothers after a long time. The games are simple (like those old 8 bit games) and funny. More games are expected. Devs should consider implementing some of the open source free games to make it more engaging. The free version is heavily limited where you'll be locked out for 30 seconds and 5 minutes for every 5mins and 30 mins respectively. In addition, only 2 players can join in the free version. It should be atleast 3 people for a real multi-player (as against dual-player), with ad supported. Premium is very inexpensive, though.

We just spent the last few hours playing these games as a family. It was so much fun.  The kids did not wanna stop playing.    Edit:  After a week or so we are still enjoying AirConsole. It can be hard to get three teenagers to sit and enjoy family time, but this works everytime.  I really recommend this one!

Originally had it at 5 stars. Now has wayy to many ads. Every 30 min makes you take a 5 min break (unless you buy the premium version or whatever). It does have SOME fun games to play with friends....  But It now makes you buy the Super version to play with more than 2 people. So if you want to play with more that 1 friend you have to pay for it. Dont get it

Amazing!!! Being able to play games  on the go is exactly what you need!! A nintendo switch is useless if you have this! Me and my cousins really enjoyed this. However, the only thing I would really want is to view the game on your phone or device instead of on a TV or other things as if everyone who is playing has a nintendo switch and can see their character or whatever on it.   Thanks for reading I hope my idea will be implemented

description: THE WALKING DEAD: MARCH TO WAR is an all-new intense free-to-play multiplayer strategy game set in the world of the beloved The Walking Dead comics by Robert Kirkman.Players are survivors in the ruins of the nation‚Äôs capital now overrun by walkers. Potential allies and enemies lurk around every corner. Real-time competitive play and a shared need for crucial resources drive players to cooperate with and compete against each other in an all-out war for survival, and compete where the whole world is loaded gun pointed at the playerSet concurrent with the ‚ÄúMarch to War‚Äù story in the comics, players will encounter Rick, Negan, and other familiar faces from The Walking Dead as they build increasingly powerful bases, recruit and train survivors, form Communities, and capture familiar Landmarks in the ruins of Washington, D.C.ESTABLISH, FORTIFY, AND DEFEND BASESFind safe ground and start building. Grow your base to produce more resources, recruit more survivors and expand your power base‚Äîbut be careful: the more you have, the more your enemies can steal!RECRUIT SURVIVORSEvery survivor NPC you recruit has their own name and backstory. As they gain experience and training, you will be able to customize their abilities, tailoring your group of survivors to your specific strategy. Of course, this makes it hurt even more when not everyone survives an enemy attack or a Walker Swarm!ASSEMBLE YOUR COUNCILComplete daily missions to unlock powerful and familiar Council members who can help guide you on your way to deciding what kind of leader to become. Do you inspire like Rick? Mentor like Hershel? Or do you carry a big stick like Negan?  Only you can decide.BUILD COMMUNITIESFind other players you can trust for added protection and cooperative gameplay. Work with your community to clear dangerous Walker Swarms for huge rewards, or just team up with the strongest fighters and wipe other players off the map!DOMINATE THE MAPAlong with your community, take control of familiar Landmarks in the Washington DC area. The bigger the Landmark, the more valuable it is, and the more likely to be targeted by other Communities. How long can you hold the Pentagon? Alexandria? The White House? The Kingdom?ABOVE ALL ELSE, STAY ALIVEThe action in this game never stops. Be strong. Be smart. Stay alive, if you can.THE WALKING DEAD: MARCH TO WAR ¬©2018 Disruptor Beam, Inc. THE WALKING DEAD Copyright ¬©2018 Robert Kirkman, LLC. All Rights Reserved. Copyright ¬©2018 Skybound LLC. All Rights Reserved.
descriptionHTML:
THE WALKING DEAD: MARCH TO WAR is an all-new intense free-to-play multiplayer strategy game set in the world of the beloved The Walking Dead comics by Robert Kirkman.

Players are survivors in the ruins of the nation’s capital now overrun by walkers. Potential allies and enemies lurk around every corner. Real-time competitive play and a shared need for crucial resources drive players to cooperate with and compete against each other in an all-out war for survival, and compete where the whole world is loaded gun pointed at the player

Set concurrent with the “March to War” story in the comics, players will encounter Rick, Negan, and other familiar faces from The Walking Dead as they build increasingly powerful bases, recruit and train survivors, form Communities, and capture familiar Landmarks in the ruins of Washington, D.C.

ESTABLISH, FORTIFY, AND DEFEND BASES

Find safe ground and start building. Grow your base to produce more resources, recruit more survivors and expand your power base—but be careful: the more you have, the more your enemies can steal!

RECRUIT SURVIVORS

Every survivor NPC you recruit has their own name and backstory. As they gain experience and training, you will be able to customize their abilities, tailoring your group of survivors to your specific strategy. Of course, this makes it hurt even more when not everyone survives an enemy attack or a Walker Swarm!

ASSEMBLE YOUR COUNCIL

Complete daily missions to unlock powerful and familiar Council members who can help guide you on your way to deciding what kind of leader to become. Do you inspire like Rick? Mentor like Hershel? Or do you carry a big stick like Negan? Only you can decide.

BUILD COMMUNITIES

Find other players you can trust for added protection and cooperative gameplay. Work with your community to clear dangerous Walker Swarms for huge rewards, or just team up with the strongest fighters and wipe other players off the map!

DOMINATE THE MAP

Along with your community, take control of familiar Landmarks in the Washington DC area. The bigger the Landmark, the more valuable it is, and the more likely to be targeted by other Communities. How long can you hold the Pentagon? Alexandria? The White House? The Kingdom?

ABOVE ALL ELSE, STAY ALIVE

The action in this game never stops. Be strong. Be smart. Stay alive, if you can.

THE WALKING DEAD: MARCH TO WAR ©2018 Disruptor Beam, Inc. THE WALKING DEAD Copyright ©2018 Robert Kirkman, LLC. All Rights Reserved. Copyright ©2018 Skybound LLC. All Rights Reserved.
developerAddress: 161 Worcester Road, Suite 210, Framingham MA 01701
recentChanges: Additions and changes in MARCH TO WAR v1.3.5:
‚Ä¢ Patrol refresh timers and notifications updated. Increased the chance to receive premium rewards.
‚Ä¢ Daily Objectives will no longer involve starting or completing research after HQ level 15.
‚Ä¢ Daily Objectives involving survivor damage will now always appear in the first step.
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes
Send us your feedback at http://bit.ly/MTWHelp.
Stay alive out there,
The MARCH TO WAR Team
summary: Build, Recruit, Form Alliances, Decide...How Will You Survive The Walking Dead
title: The Walking Dead: March To War

comments: Played this on PC, and really enjoyed it for its simple, quirky playstyle. While it does trail off at the end when you've mastered everything, the entertainment value is still strong. Particularly like going back to this title every now and again for a no-pressure, casual simulation game. Surprisingly, Game Dev Tycoon is pretty smooth on mobile, so kudos to the devs!

Just gave this game 5 star everything. When this game first came out on PC I couldn't afford it, so I pirated it. Sorry Greenheart! Now I have the chance to purchase your game and I'm glad I have. I know I'm going to play this for hours on end. It is definitely the best indie game I've ever played. Looking forward to your next project Greenheart!!

Loving the game! Not sure where else to try to contact the devs, but I am having an issue. My auto save is from Year 15. I am currently in year 22, and so is my manual save. However, whenever I try to load my manual save, it only takes me back to the year 15 autosave. I know it's just a game but it's pretty upsetting to not be able to access that lost progress, so any tips or response would be awesome. Great game!

It's good. 80 hours on PC version. This has some extra bits. Just want to support Dev, but am looking forward to playing it more on phone. Haven't had a bug yet either. Controls are great, they really lended themselves to mobile!

Played for days on the PC version. This one is just like it, except in the palm of your hands. No micro transactions, coins, or loot boxes. One price for the full game. Amazing!  In Game Dev Tycoon, you make games and build a company to from your parents garage, to a fully fledged AAA Studio. The controls are awesome. Your first games will be tests to how and what gamers like. You'll develop games for real life hardware (with names changed for licensing issues). Eventually, when you get to late game, you can create your own console and compete with other companies, releasing exclusive titles of your own, and dominating the market share.   You'll easily lose if you're not careful with your finances, but the game is so addicting that you'll keep coming back to it. Like I did.

I don't ever rate games, but this one deserves it. Only been playing an hour and I love it. I'm already excited to start over and try things differently. Totally worth the money and I highly suggest this for any sim fans. Great time killer as well. Good job guys.
description: Welcome to Game Dev Tycoon. In this business simulation game you start your own game development company in the 80s. Create best selling games, research new technologies to boost your business and invent new game types. Become the leader of the market and gain worldwide fans.Create games your wayYour success depends on your creativity and willingness to experiment. What topics and genres go well together? Should your Action game focus more on engine optimization or on quest design? The decisions you make during the development of your games will have a major impact on the ratings you receive.Grow your companyOnce you have successfully released a few games you can move into your own office and forge a world-class development team. descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Game Dev Tycoon. In this business simulation game you start your own game development company in the 80s. Create best selling games, research new technologies to boost your business and invent new game types. Become the leader of the market and gain worldwide fans.

Create games your way
Your success depends on your creativity and willingness to experiment. What topics and genres go well together? Should your Action game focus more on engine optimization or on quest design? The decisions you make during the development of your games will have a major impact on the ratings you receive.

Grow your company
Once you have successfully released a few games you can move into your own office and forge a world-class development team. Hire staff, train them and unlock new options.

Features
🕹 Start a game development company in the 80s
✍ Design and create games
💡 Gain new insights through game reports
👁 Research new technologies
⚙ Create custom game engines
🏢 Move into bigger offices
👩🏽‍💻 Forge a world-class development team
🔬 Unlock secret labs
📈 Become a market leader
💚 Gain worldwide fans
🥇 Unlock achievements

The full game has many more features which are not listed here to prevent spoilers.

The mobile version introduces
☠ A super-difficult (but optional) pirate mode
📰 An updated storyline
👩‍🍳 New topics for even more varied games
📱 New UI optimized for phones and tablets

A game with 💚
Game Dev Tycoon does not contain any in-app purchases or ads and you can play it without an internet connection. Enjoy!

Teams, Challenges), ability to givie Hearts to friends without using Facebook Also can you PLEASE improve the notification! My friend sends me Requests to Bowl & most of the time I don't get notified. Thank U

Not sure how the currency works or how to upgrade my levels. Played 10 times and still can't upgrade the ball. Do they expect real cash to upgrade 1 ball? Also the controls are touchy, I've inadvertently chucked a few balls into the gutter while trying to align it before my release. Some tutorials would be nice.

I did like this fame but my lane keeps turning pink along with the ball so I can't actually see anything like where the ball is going.... and on quick fire again turns everything pink and don't let me take any shoots what do ever.. think it's a glitch in the game I'm not sure but tried restarting the game and the same thing is happening again and again... on all the different lanes and extra games in bowling king...

Great graphics and realistic feel to the lanes. Controls are a bit wonky, however, and purists won't like being being able to steer the ball after it leaves your "hand." LOTS of attempted upsells, but its free to play features ain't too bad on their own, either. All in all, a decent little bowling game.

comments: Great for passing time, although at times you get kind of stuck where you can't gather any more materials because of storage capacity but then it takes forever to get the items for upgrade. The coin amount to buy some buildings is quite high on a lot of them, and the same with the trees and extra livestock. All in all I love playing this user friendly game!

It has potential to be a great game. Its just so sloooow because you have to spend gems for almost everything. Its hard to get seeds because it's hard to get gems not everyone can afford to spend on these games. The land expansion sucks!!! It takes way to much, can't get what's needed half the time. Easier ways to get seeds and coins and it will be better.... Thanks!

I enjoy this game. It's very addictive but in a good way. I actually just got my wife hooked on playing it as well.   My one question though, why are there so many differences between the Android system version and the IPhone system  version? On each building, my wife can see each item available and what level is needed to unlock it. That doesn't show on mine. Also, on hers, she has a fair/bazaar looking building, a delivery truck, and a hot air balloon thing.  Why are these not on the android version????

Good game,  potential to be great I enjoy most of this game. To make it even better - more tools or the ability to buy them,  I have land I can't use because I can't clear it.  The ability to move trees,  grass, rocks until we are able to clear them, so we can make better use of our land. Better rewards  for completing collections,  I've gotten coins and 1 or 2 shovels.  Not good considering how long it takes to complete & that it says win up to 10 tools!?!  Better fishing,  I only catch catfish,  bass,  and anchovies.

Half my images are invisible. I can't see half of my buildings or the items to craft, crafted items, items on sale or even my stand. I submitted a report to Storm 8 only to be told in a automated reply that they don't have the staff to handle it and there was nothing that would be done. I loved this game and had recently started over, looking forward to playing. Now, once I hit lvl 8, I'm uninstalling.

Farm story 2 This game could be used and enjoyed more but at this time I am not playing as it is more frustrating them fun.  I need to expand the barn and silo but the things needed are a large amounts and RARE to achieve or even buy in the market.  Frustrated with trying to upgrade my barn so I will be taking a break for a while and will see if I return

descriptionHTML:
Farm Story 2 is a farm simulator that lets you explore a beautiful 3D world to harvest crops, raise
animals and discover exciting surprises! Join in on the long-awaited sequel to our #1 hit farming
game!

Play with friends for free and as long as you want, turning your fresh produce into delicious goods
to become a farming legend! Go fishing, design your ranch and adopt pets to liven up your farm!

Available in English, Deutsch, Español, Français, Italiano, 日本語, 中国语言, 한국어

FARM STORY 2 FEATURES

FARM GAME - Build your farm from the ground up
- Farm simulator - Get the chance to get up close and personal with your favorite animals
- Farming game - Plant crops and raise livestock as you try to become the best farmer
- Management game - Choose your own direction for the farm you build

MINI GAMES - Play mini games to expand and enhance your farm
- Growing game - Plant and harvest your own crops
- Trading game - Buy and sell with neighbors to profit from your hard work
- Mining game - Delve deep to uncover precious gems and jewelry
- Storyline game - Unlock and meet special characters as you expand your farm

FISHING GAME - Discover Hidden Surprises
- Fishing for fun - Relax while expanding your farm! Use fish to fulfill tasks or create new items on
your farm
- Casual games - Fishing can return gems, paint and more! You never know what you’ll find

COOKING GAMES - Make meals from your ingredients
- Cooking for all - Craft delicious meals in your Kitchen, snacks with your Deep Fryer, or desserts
in the Chocolatier!
- Harvest fresh ingredients - Whip up your favorite dishes instantly with your homegrown crops!
- Trade your food - Trade or sell your foods to make your farm as big as you can!

BUILDING GAME - Build your farm from scratch
- Design - Build your farm from the ground up – literally! Plant crops, raise animals and play mini
games to build the farm of your dreams!
- Decorate - Customize your ranch strategically to maximize growth and earn rewards!

RAISE ANIMALS - Expand your livestock
- Raising games - Collect a barnyard full of cute and playful animals
- Milk the cow - Get what you need for all your farming needs like for milk, eggs and wool
- Raise animals - Each cow, chicken, sheep and horse you collect expands your ranch

PET GAMES - Add cute characters to your farm
- Pets - Adopt cute kittens and charismatic canines
- Raise animals - receive amazing rewards that help your farm

FREE TO PLAY - Play Farm Story 2 for free
- Building games for free - Download Farm Story 2 for free, and start building your dream farm

The farm game you’ve been waiting for is here at last! Come and play the BEST looking FREE TO
PLAY farm game for Android!

Farm Story 2 is an online only game. Your device must have an active internet connection to play.
Please note that Farm Story 2 is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money.
To disable this feature, go to the Google Play app on your device, tap the Menu button, select
Settings > Use password to restrict purchases. Then follow the directions to complete setup. In
addition, Farm Story 2 may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have
access to your information through such services.

Storm8 Studios is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer on Android.

data are subject to Storm8 Studios Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at

comments: I think this app needs to be redesigned as a stand alone non-MMORPG that does not require any form of Sociopathetic Media. Cute design concept. Interesting plot. Clever programming. But I despise anything remotely like Social Media Community gatherings. If people want to meet get outside and go somewhere. The library, park, museum, etc.

I usually download games and get rid of them because they aren't as good as they are made out to be. Also I get bored fast with games. Shards of Magic has been really fun and I play it often everyday when I have time! Nice to have a game that I don't get bored with. Oh! and you can buy gems, however, its easy to accumulate gems just playing! Have fun!

Been a fan since Crystal Saga. Played Wartune when it first came out and participated in the open beta of Dragon pals. Played Crystal Saga 2, am lvl 82 on S1. Now I'm trying your mobile games. Keep up the good work, coming from one of your fans!

Was a great game. But the pay to win has been pushed way way too far. The only way to play competitive anymore is to spend.. and spend big. I have always been happy to buy vip.. but the amounts of money you have to drop now to remain competitive is outrageous. Thanks for killing my favorite mobile app with greed r2.
Game is buggy, you email support... bugs never get fixed.  They run gem promotions to give 30% bonus and it doesnt give any... fraudulent imo.  Dont waste your time.

It's another one of those games that cranks numbers up so high to make us feel special. It's like seeing an item for 4.99. Wowee, it's less than 5! Play summoners war instead. Same concept, less pandering to fragile egos.
description: Immerse yourself in the most enthralling strategy RPG experience on mobile yet! Shards of Magic will draw you in with stunning 3D visual effects, rich strategic gameplay, and witty voice acting. Assemble a legendary team of unique characters to set forth on a riveting adventure like no other! Find the Shards of Magic, before Dusan, the evil Lord of the Abyss can claim them for himself. The road is paved with hordes of enemies, epic bosses, and countless other obstacles. Discover an exciting, fully fledged campaign spanning over 350 stages, each with three different difficulties for additional replayability. Collect and choose from hundreds of heroes, each with an array of various devastating skills to aid you on your journey. Form a powerful party by synergizing skills and unit placement to create the ultimate battle force! With the mighty elemental guardians at your back, nothing stands in your way.Now, it‚Äôs up to you. Seize your destiny, and stop Dusan from destroying the world, and everything in it. Play the freshest RPG on mobile to date!‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖKEY FEATURES‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖExplore Abundant Content‚òÖExpansive, fully voiced campaign mode featuring 350+ stages, and over 280 unique, battle-hungry heroes to collect and upgrade as your RPG adventure unfolds.‚òÖExperience Strategic Gameplay‚òÖExploit the enemy weakness by varying your team setup. Pair the right party members for synergy bonuses and maximum power boosts to gain the edge over your foes.‚òÖCompete in Dynamic PvP Combat‚òÖProve your skills in battle against other players. Rise to the top of the leaderboards in numerous compelling duels against rivals from all over the world.‚òÖDiscover Thrilling PvE Action‚òÖJoin in on daily world boss raids, master challenging endless dungeon modes, and more! Earn rare loot to gear up for your adventures.‚òÖPlay Together‚òÖTeam up in demanding server-wide boss raids, join guilds for special events, hire veteran players to aid you in battle, support your friends, by sending them energy or stamina, and much more.Connect with us and always be up-to-date! comments: I've tried many TD so far still playing this one..every level in every map is unique..  its cool how I can pick and lvl Heroes but then it takes awhile to add a new one when running out of gems (since gems are needed for Heroes) unless u pay to keep playing or just to wait for tournaments... it takes patience lol but I don't mind playing again

A great game with unique map designs and user friendly controls, free to play if you have patience and play strategically, pay to win if you want to advance faster. It is especially a good game for busy people like me who can only spend 10-15 minutes per day but need to stay in the game for a large number of days to be competitive. Don't try to use items and gems on every maps, it is fun and challenging to clear them without shortcuts. *Tip for developers*: Instead of giving purchase options for Sethos and Phoenix they could go with Yan and Narlax, gives chance for new players to compete also developers can milk in additional purchases.

Great TD game with decent difficulty and NPCs progression while still maintining a pattern making you work to figure out various strategies.  Ads have never been an issue I honestly cant remember where they are.  I think they may only be for like "double your rewards for battle" kind of thing.  90% (A) or better in my oppinion.  Mainly cause I want to see more progression.  Note I am only a few levels in so I dont know if theres a pay to get by an immpassable place yet.
*Updated* SCAM! Games slowly bleeds away your gems without mechanics being apparent. (I lost 300 gems in the last 3 days) Good luck unlocking heroes or content without paying $30-40. -2 stars.

Your game is WAY too hard. I am at level 90+ and found the first 3 worlds great fun and balanced but now you have effectively destroyed the enjoyment factor by making the enemies SO strong that you cannot possibly beat them unless you have max level heroes...and the best max level heroes require so much to level up that without paying an absurd amount of real money you may aswell give up.you have broken what could have been the best game on android with selfish Pay 2 win tactics . Uninstalling after months of enjoyment and gameplay.  You need to fix this and make it challenging but not impossible
It's really addicting, a lot of challenges and puzzles for the towers... really loved it! Good job team!   A bit of improvement: maybe an easier way to access the other worlds would be really good!?
description: This is a tower defense challenge that lies in a magical fantasy world. Epic heroes fight in a war to defend the kingdom with top strategy and a rush of inspiration. Battle with Death Knights and fight alongside with knights, dragons, wizard, ice queen, and other ancient gods in the adventure field! The forces of evil amass. Why do they march? Where is their home? No one knows. The prophets' vision is cloudy. The geomancers see little in their maps. Everyone else? They flee. The Allied Kingdoms struggle to survive. Life and all its purpose has no meaning to these fiends. Fields rot. Woods burn. The common folk suffer. Devastation is happening! The Allied Kingdoms have one choice: defend, defend, defend. Are you ready? Realm Defense is a tower defense game that challenges veteran players. Use a huge variety of powers and abilities to vanquish wave after wave of menace for over 100 levels. Travel through lush forests, snow covered mountains, and epic desert as you face off against armies of slimes, goblins, skeletons, and more. Deploy rapid-fire archers! Carve walls on the map with magic beams! Fire roaring cannons! Summon allies! Realm Defense offers variety and challenge. Overcome incredible odds with strategy and wit! Rescue helpless villagers, collect important resources, and recruit legendary heroes with deadly abilities along the way to stop evil in this standout tower defense game. ¬†‚Ä¢	100+ levels with various game play modes‚Ä¢	Multiple worlds to play with 4 different towers each ‚Ä¢	Compete in tournament to show off your tower defense skills and win big prize‚Ä¢	Powerful heroes with unique abilities to aid you: Fee the Archer launches a deadly Kill Shot, Lancelot the Knight unleashes the Fist of Justice, Smoulder the Dragon rains down Heat Seeker fireballs and many more‚Ä¢	Face off against epic bosses including a Skeleton Mage that rides a giant slime and zaps your heroes and a bomb tossing, mammoth riding Goblin King‚Ä¢	Huge variety of enemies offer multiple challenges: Burn your enemy, freeze them, and more with 4 spells to cast in battle‚Ä¢	Beautiful landscapes and character animations ¬†¬†PLEASE NOTE! This game is free to play and made by people who love tower defense games. descriptionHTML:
This is a tower defense challenge that lies in a magical fantasy world. Epic heroes fight in a war to defend the kingdom with top strategy and a rush of inspiration. Battle with Death Knights and fight alongside with knights, dragons, wizard, ice queen, and other ancient gods in the adventure field!

The forces of evil amass. Why do they march? Where is their home? No one knows. The prophets' vision is cloudy. The geomancers see little in their maps. Everyone else? They flee. The Allied Kingdoms struggle to survive. Life and all its purpose has no meaning to these fiends. Fields rot. Woods burn. The common folk suffer. Devastation is happening! The Allied Kingdoms have one choice: defend, defend, defend. Are you ready?

Realm Defense is a tower defense game that challenges veteran players. Use a huge variety of powers and abilities to vanquish wave after wave of menace for over 100 levels. Travel through lush forests, snow covered mountains, and epic desert as you face off against armies of slimes, goblins, skeletons, and more.

Deploy rapid-fire archers! Carve walls on the map with magic beams! Fire roaring cannons! Summon allies! Realm Defense offers variety and challenge. Overcome incredible odds with strategy and wit! Rescue helpless villagers, collect important resources, and recruit legendary heroes with deadly abilities along the way to stop evil in this standout tower defense game.  


• 100+ levels with various game play modes
• Multiple worlds to play with 4 different towers each
• Compete in tournament to show off your tower defense skills and win big prize
• Powerful heroes with unique abilities to aid you: Fee the Archer launches a deadly Kill Shot, Lancelot the Knight unleashes the Fist of Justice, Smoulder the Dragon rains down Heat Seeker fireballs and many more
• Face off against epic bosses including a Skeleton Mage that rides a giant slime and zaps your heroes and a bomb tossing, mammoth riding Goblin King
• Huge variety of enemies offer multiple challenges: Burn your enemy, freeze them, and more with 4 spells to cast in battle
• Beautiful landscapes and character animations
  

PLEASE NOTE! This game is free to play and made by people who love tower defense games. We sincerely hope you enjoy our work!

comments: Amazing game very addictive...  Love the fact that they have a specials  more often... Also like the events with the second hospitals... Would like if we had special events more often... Just wish we had a platform to save the game my sister had to restart the game 6 times i had to do it twice... Wou be great to save progress on fb or another platform... Even log in  Really frustrating when we lose progress.... I only need 5 more characters then I'll have them all... So if i lose progress again im not starting over  Overall my favorite game on my phone!! Thx

I couldn't get enough patients, I couldn't get enough cash, and my staff energy seemed to drain way too fast. I love the surgery games but you maybe get one of those a day. I ended up uninstalling when room upgrades said they would take 12 hours. Too much waiting, not enough action. I liked the story so far too. Maybe I'll reinstall in the future if the times go down.

It's a great game at first, but it takes so long to upgrade or save money or anything that you end up spending a lot of your real life money. Plus the surgeries all start to be the exact same, and the glitches... oh, the glitches. Zapped $200,000 out of my bank, and that bloody epinephrine shot is impossible to get without striking out. Oh, and $120,000 for research that will only make you $4,000? Why is everything so time and resource consuming???

Controls don't work properly during surgery! There is lot of lag while performing an action while the timer works properly. Moreover, it doesn't allow me to suture the skin, even if I'm trying to do it right (it worked at the begining). Please fix these bugs or I will uninstal the game...

Love the overall feel of this, though some things need tweeking. For example, I only have half of the staff available and am now getting far too many duplicate cards concidering how many I have left to get. Makes it feel all too much like it's pushing people to spend real money, something that always ends with me deleting the game and moving on. Hope this doesn't happen in this case, but I'm not holding my breath...

It's a nice game, I like the concept, you get to operate on patients and manage a hospital. Problem with the recruitment part, it was always giving me surgeons and wasted 200 hearts on the same person. There should be an option if you want to fire someone or replace with another staff. The biggest issue is with their connectivity, internet connection is very stable works with all apps except for this one, no idea why. Fix it please I would hate to delete this game. Thanks.
description: Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital! Game Characteristicsüöë  Play the most realistic surgery simulationsüöë  Build your own hospitalüöë  Hire new medical staff members and train them to save livesüöë  Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research departmentüöë  Dive into two captivating seasons üöë  Stay tuned! We‚Äôre continuously developing and adding new missions and contentPERFORM SURGERIESPerforming challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITALBuild and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You‚Äôll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMALive dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors. Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!
descriptionHTML:
Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital!

Game Characteristics

🚑 Play the most realistic surgery simulations
🚑 Build your own hospital
🚑 Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives
🚑 Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department
🚑 Dive into two captivating seasons
🚑 Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and content

PERFORM SURGERIES

Performing challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!

BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITAL

Build and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!

EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMA

Live dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors.

Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!

comments: I enjoy this game. Almost forgot about the other games I'm playing. Little confused about some things still, but it's fun. That's the whole point. Right? Something fun to do while you wait,or all day because you have nothing else to do.
After reaching level 15, I was supposed to be awarded points in a different app - DID NOT receive points even after submitting a support ticket. So it was a waste of time for me

It takes to long to cook somethings it don't even take 6hrs to make cookies in real life. The strawberries 2 at a time an 17hrs to grow come on get serious. It's never other ways to get strawberries u have to buy the coin alot in order to get most things which wldnt be a big deal if u wld make things more practical like the time it takes to make food an grow fruit especially the strawberries. Two many ppl order stuff requiring strawberries so they sitting there 2 an 3 days for there order wld not happen in real life. Fix the time it takes to cook an grow food.

Its a good game sorry far I'm only level 11 but the gameplay is good. Only thing I would have to complain about is the lack of excitement in the food yeah it's different but to much stuff to get with so little goodies
A good game, however it would be better if you could earn cash more easily and quickly rather than having to spend real money constantly, it will put me off eventually

So you want to be a chef? Well you picked the wrong game. Might want to try either World Chef or Country Cooking. Either one is better then this piece of garbage. REPLY 3-2-2018 The afore mentioned games don't have any ads (except watch a video). Therefore they are way better in that aspect alone. Get rid of the ads and I'll give more stars. A "classy 5 star restaurant" doesn't need ads. So that makes me think this game has NO class or programmers are greedy or both. REPLY 3-5-2018 I did contact in game support and they basically  said: "So sad, to bad, we don't care." So again that makes me think the makers of this piece of trash are just  a bunch of greedy people. If you respond to this quit giving me canned responses..

descriptionHTML:
Selected among Best Games of 2016!

Are you a foodie? Are you a cook? Do you like to create recipes or simply put together a good cookbook?
You can now live your dream of becoming a Master Chef and building your own classy restaurant with humble beginnings.

Rustle up Soups and Starters, Pastas and Pizzas, Cakes and Cookies and all the other delicious mouth watering cuisines from across the world and grow from an amateur cook to a culinary master while you lovingly cater to and delight all your customers!

Being a Top Chef is not just about running a kitchen. It’s about having the right tools, getting the right mix of ingredients, using the freshest produce, to bring in flavor and that dash of spice and zing! Plate up exotic dishes, ramp up your restaurant tastefully with elegant décor and begin your tryst with the awesome world of food to realize your dream of becoming the Star Chef!

----------

FEATURES:
• Cook and master appetizing world cuisine
• Build a world-class kitchen with top-of-the-line cooking appliances
• Hire and manage skilled staff to help you in your kitchen
• Customize and build the restaurant of your dreams with elegant wall and floor decors, stylish tables, fountains and more!
• Grow fresh produce from your very own backyard!
• Serve delicious food to hungry foodies who visit your Restaurant!
• Play with friends on Facebook and Game Center, visit their Restaurants and send gifts at the Chef's Circle!
• Trade cooked dishes and veggies with other Star Chef players at the Food Truck and Chef's Store!
• Start a bustling Catering Business and expand your Restaurant Empire!
• Get ‘Likes’ from fellow Chefs and make your Restaurant the Talk of the Town

----------

Play Contests & Win Rewards. Check Star Chef out on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/starchefgame
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/starchefgame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/starchefgame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpli7mmzh90baRptig83nTQ

----------

Facing issues while playing Star Chef or have suggestions/feedback? We would love to hear from you – Contact us at https://99games.helpshift.com/a/star-chef-cooking-game

----------
NOTE
Access Authorization to play the game (the game may not run as expected if not authorized)
• Authorization is required for saving game progress on external storage
• Authorization is required for access to accounts service that is required for social game features

descriptionHTML:
Enkelt og vanedannende ordspil
Ordmester byder på det klassiske gameplay fra ordspil i en ny og sjov indpakning. Du skal bare stryge bogstaver for at opstille forskellige ord. Det er nemt at spille og sjovt at mestre. Du vil med garanti blive afhængig af at have det sjovt med ordsøgning i dette ordspil.

Mere end 2.000 baner
Det starter med enkle og daglige ord, men vores ordspil byder på tusindvis af ordopgaver, som du kan spille på forskellige niveauer. Mange flere nye baner vil blive tilføjet i fremtiden.

Udfordrende at finde alle ord
Ikke nok at finde ord i de nemme baner? Prøv at udfordre dig selv ved at finde de ekstra svære ord for at få bonus. Hvis du sidder fast på bestemte ord, kan du bruge “Bland” eller “Tips” til at komme videre. Det kan komme som en stor overraskelse hvor nemt et ord kan være, selvom du bare ikke kan finde det.

Bedste hjernetræning
Ordspil er det bedste for hjernetræning og forbedring af stavefærdigheder. Vores ordspil er et af de mest spændende spil med ordgætning & ordsøgning til at udfordre evnerne til ordsøgning i alle aldre.


FUNKTIONER
- Stryg bogstaverne for at opstille ordene
- Find ekstra ord for at indsamle mønter
- 2000+ BANER som du kan spille
- GRATIS at få Daglig Bonus mønter
- Tryk på knappen “Bland” for at ændre rækkefølgen af bogstaver
- Tryk på knappen “Tips” for at få hjælp
- Passende for både børn og voksne til at træne ordsøgningsevner
- Ingen netværksforbindelse påkrævet og du kan nyde ordsøgning når som helst
- Enkelt og nemt at spille, udfordrende gameplay
- Helt GRATIS for alle spillere

Hvis du er fan af krydsordsopgaver eller ordsøgningsspil, skal du helt klart prøve dette ordspil. Det er nemmere at komme i gang med end krydsord og meget mere vanedannende.


KONTAKT
support@wordtailorgames.freshdesk.com
