comments: Had to delete game due to ads popping up when I unlock phone.  If it wasn't for the ad issue, might played longer. It was getting tiresome going down to mine, a cave somewhere in the middle to find to restart a mission, then back to the top to smelt/craft. Then you have the auto mining platforms that are movable but one wrong touch and it resets.   Graphics were great.  There are other game like this, that don't spam ads during nongame play, that are equal or better
Hey wonderful game! Except that I might have broken it...killed the Amber Elder before crafting tesla coil.
its insane how much you have to pay for upgrading digging tools,, uninstallig it after a year playing, sad but true
Nice idle clicker. Nothing too hard or complicated. Just fun to login a couple times a day and waste 5 min of your time

Game takes longer and longer to load with every update: I'm at the point that I fire up the game and have to wait 10 minutes plus until I can actually play. Works fine after, but getting tiresome. As is the really pointless nuclear reactor that takes months to fuel for one short run. Weapon upgrades now stupid requirements - latest needs more obsidian than I've mined in over a year.... Get a grip on reality people!
I don't hate the game; however I have just wasted 40 gems for doubling resources farmed, but they did not double... please address this asap  Thanks
description: Deep Town is science fiction strategy game where you play as an AI, with a sole purpose to gather, construct, and replicate. DIG DEEPCrust of a planet is very deep, filled with different metals, gems and rare findings. A high tech digging system as yours, is capable of drilling through any rock, using tons of different techs like driller robots, cryogenic freezing techs, fire blasts and others, you name it! MAKE FACTORIESMake buildings, auto mine resources, smelt and forge metals, craft items, Build efficient factory pipelines, and sell things for profit!Build a world of your own, an underground town of steampunk minded bots.EXPLORE YOUR PLANETOne word - archeology. On your digging journey - find caves and send explorer bots to see what's inside, uncover the hidden story behind your planet's past, and answer the age long question - where are we?Deep town is a free indie game, and one of the best strategy games in your pocket with idle elements, and factory clicker one tap mechanics it could be the best miner or digger out there. We love to describe it as an Underground city builder of sorts. If you ever played digging games, this town clicker is for you!
descriptionHTML:
Deep Town is science fiction strategy game where you play as an AI, with a sole purpose to gather, construct, and replicate.

DIG DEEP

Crust of a planet is very deep, filled with different metals, gems and rare findings. A high tech digging system as yours, is capable of drilling through any rock, using tons of different techs like
driller robots, cryogenic freezing techs, fire blasts and others, you name it!

MAKE FACTORIES

Make buildings, auto mine resources, smelt and forge metals, craft items,
Build efficient factory pipelines, and sell things for profit!
Build a world of your own, an underground town of steampunk minded bots.

EXPLORE YOUR PLANET

One word - archeology. On your digging journey - find caves and send explorer bots to see what's inside, uncover the hidden story behind your planet's past, and answer the age long question - where are we?

Deep town is a free indie game, and one of the best strategy games in your pocket with idle elements, and factory clicker one tap mechanics it could be the best miner or digger out there. We love to describe it as an Underground city builder of sorts. If you ever played digging games, this town clicker is for you!

comments: I love this game! Its BEYOND ADDICTIVE! There is no Methadone to cure or lure one away from the graphics, variety of bonus games or ever changing levels that erase reality and become the Pied Piper as its classical music lures one into its universe of gaming. This is a "slot," which appeals to those who also enjoy a nether-universe of of scifi/fantasu. Its visually appealing, as well as, fun!!!! An AWESOME SITE!!!

Yes it looks and sounds amazing. But short of that, this slot game is completely unremarkable. Just like every other slot game out there, wins are few and far between. The hourly bonus is weak aswel. When you're at a level that requires you to max bet (25000000 or more) and you win 1000000 on the hour bonus and have nothing in the credit meter due to the lack of free spins and no bonuses, it becomes very frustrating. Install if you're easily entertained by graphics and sound, because thats seriously the only thing you will get from this.

comments: Finally a mobile mmo that actually feels like a real mmorpg. Nice graphics, skills, open world questing, lots of players. Fights are engaging  and boss fights are spectacular and interactive. You do need a team for dungeons and raids as you can't just 1 shot everything, like in other mobile mmos. I've tried loads but this is the best by far! Keep it up!

Man, this is a perfect 5/7! Out of a crapton of Mu Origin game clones, this is even better than original! Polished graphics, nice player skills set, awesome UI items layout - everything is top notch! The only thing I can wish for is adding camera turn on top of player strafe via joystick. Thanks for the hard work, and please keep it up!

Great mobile MMO! Good graphics and narration so the story stays interesting. Additionally...SO much Co-op and PvP and a lot of things to give an edge. Not P2P dominated either so far. Obviously the grind to 55 is tough but I have a few characters on different servers there still very possible.

I think this game is amazing for an MMO mobile. It has a feeling of blade and soul and WOW and the graphics sre amazing on my Razer phone! Actually feels like a real MMO, and I like that there are character voices.  Only problem I am having is whenever I go to turn the Volume up or down all sound cuts out and won't come back on until i restart the game. So I need to pre-set my volume before launching the game and then not touch the volume while playing.

I'm furious.  First you guys fix the Android problem. Now I run thru the update and a screen pops up that I need to relaunch game because it's out of date. How when I literally JUST watched it update? I've spent a lot of time on this game and really like it but if I can't even get to the character select screen, why would I keep it on my phone. It's a shame, it really is.

Could not even start playing. At the start screen the audio is pushing and choppy. This persisted into the game itself, turning off the music did not help, though turning off all sound did. Not playing this type of game without sound. I have a Note 8, so a top of the pine phone, so it's not me running  a phone that can't handle this type of game

descriptionHTML:
The Desolation Wall has fallen after 700 years of peace, it’s now up to you and your allies to battle the demon hordes occupying your land!

Adventure in this Vast 3D Fantasy Open World redefining the MMORPG experience on mobile. Start your journey by selecting either Ranger, Warrior, Mystic, Paladin, Elementalist Classes, each with their own distinct strengths and characteristics.

BATTLE SYSTEMS

•Join up to 40 guild mates as you take on bosses and collect loot in Dungeon Raids
•Prove yourself in Arena Battle with 1v1, 3v3, and 5v5 modes and participate to unlock powerful gear sets
•Show-off your superior skills and defend your glory as you take part in large scale battles
•Put your survival instincts to the test as you take part in Battle Royale mode

IMMERSIVE GAMEPLAY

•PC quality graphics to immerse you in this impressive MMO game on mobile
•300+ hours of gameplay including hundreds of paths for your hero
•Vibrant fantasy world with the ability to reach the coveted legendary status of level 55

CUSTOMIZATION

•Thousands of available weapons, armor, clothes and more
•Collect rare items providing specific advantages which players can combine to become powerful
•50 unique mounts from a flying carpet to a fire breathing dragon

SOCIAL

•Chat with players around the world utilizing the integrated voice system
•Take in-game selfies, share personalized heroes, and your favorite moments with friends on social media

CONNECT WITH US

Facebook: https://facebook.com/crusadersmmo
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7fPAi77lcCWFUc94UHyfGg
Forums: http://forums.netease-na.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/crusadersmmo

Notes:
• This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases.

summary: 40 Person Raids at Your Fingertips

After the last update I started having problem with game interface. I always played this game in left hand interface but now I need to change the interface before each and every hunt. The worst is even if I change the interface to left handed before a dual the game automatically changed the interface to right hand. And after a dual starts there is no way to access the setting to change to left hand. Please fix it! It's like forcing a left handed person to write with his right hand. I don't play duals anymore because of this problem. And I know if I don't play duals I won't get anywhere in this game. Be considerate please and fix it

I love this game and the graphics are really neat but, there are a few bugs that seriously need of fixing. For starters, when I'm in the middle of a duel, it will straight up just kick me off and it will exit the game completely...its very frustrating. Second, why when someone is doing the duel, the opponent gets an extra 20 seconds to complete it?? I have won so many duels but since they get an extra 20 seconds, they tend to beat me when clearly I was ahead when the duel was actually over...please fix this. I really do love this game but it needs debugged to be a badass game.
It would be better if you could walk. Around instead of being in one spot and only able to look left and right. Other than that it's a good way to kill time.

comments: I'm a big mahjong player and this game is like mahjong on crack. i definitely recommend it to my fellow mahjong nerds. it's awesome with how many levels there are and boosters and achievements and the whole shebang. not just a regular mahjong game where you can only play the game and nothing more. if you like the whole saving up crystals and buying boosters and earning achievements jawn, then you'll love this game. side note, I also have not spent real life money on this game mostly because I don't need to. I usually will buy stuff for games only because I use the money I get from my Google rewards app cause that money goes straight into my Google play account. so it's not that I'm anti spending money on games, but I haven't yet felt like I needed to. it's not one of those where you need to spend money to have it be fun at all (well, not yet anyway! hopefully that won't change) or to be able to get past a certain point. so I totally recommend this to all my mahjong nerd brothers and sisters!

It is a shame that this game allows one to start a new mod and a day or two later sends the player back to the original mod to collect hats, lanterns or eggs. A more polite end to an uncompleted game would be "Try Again!" rather than "You lose!" This the most rude end that I have seen on any of these games.

So far its good! Just wish you would not link all your games like you do it bogs the games down. And wish you would fix it so that if you had a game several years ago in which you used your email address you could reuse it even if you can't remember your password

A different spin on the classic MahJong game. It's fast-paced  and sometimes it doesn't respond as quick as I  would like. I wish the game would allow just a little more time because it is difficult to see the different levels to find all the matching tiles.

I love this game. However I do have problems with the loading. It says there is no internet connection which is not true. I have fast ADSL and it is connected all the time. Why don't I have problems with other games then? They all work perfectly. Please look into this matter. Thanking you.

I paid 1.99 for 40 eggs and game earned the other 5... and the "unique prize" was 5 gems.... I would think it would be something a little more...idk just more. Other than that, the game is awesome. Love the whole idea. Levels, like any other of the "saga" games with mahjong.
description: Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!Embark on a magical journey in this addictive Mahjong Solitaire adventure!Enjoy a new take on Mahjong Shanghai as you help a young girl and her grandfather traverse the globe in search of her lost parents. Make your way by pairing tiles in order to dismantle hundreds of layouts. Collect achievements for special accomplishments while taking advantage of innovative gameplay twists like Shuffle, which allows you to get out of a difficult situation, or Firecracker, a tool for blowing up multiple pairs of tiles. Visit the Forbidden City, Virupaksha Temple, the Taj Mahal and the famous Mount Fuji as you fulfill challenging quests and earn gold stars for completing levels as fast as you can!While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.‚óè Master over 1100 immersive levels (with hundreds more coming in free updates)‚óè Match 1134 types of tiles in 27 different tile sets (with more coming in free updates)‚óè Earn over 40 desirable achievements and utilize four groundbreaking power-ups‚óè Enjoy gorgeous graphics, rich sounds and regular free updates with new levels, tile sets and more‚óè Google Play game services support______________________________ COMPATIBILITY NOTES: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.______________________________ VISIT US: www.g5e.com WATCH US: www.youtube.com/g5enter FIND US: www.facebook.com/g5games FOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/g5gamesTerms of Service: http://www.g5e.com/termsofserviceG5 End User License Supplemental Terms: http://www.g5e.com/G5_End_User_License_Supplemental_Terms
descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!

Embark on a magical journey in this addictive Mahjong Solitaire adventure!

Enjoy a new take on Mahjong Shanghai as you help a young girl and her grandfather traverse the globe in search of her lost parents. Make your way by pairing tiles in order to dismantle hundreds of layouts. Collect achievements for special accomplishments while taking advantage of innovative gameplay twists like Shuffle, which allows you to get out of a difficult situation, or Firecracker, a tool for blowing up multiple pairs of tiles. Visit the Forbidden City, Virupaksha Temple, the Taj Mahal and the famous Mount Fuji as you fulfill challenging quests and earn gold stars for completing levels as fast as you can!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

● Master over 1100 immersive levels (with hundreds more coming in free updates)
● Match 1134 types of tiles in 27 different tile sets (with more coming in free updates)
● Earn over 40 desirable achievements and utilize four groundbreaking power-ups
● Enjoy gorgeous graphics, rich sounds and regular free updates with new levels, tile sets and more
● Google Play game services support
______________________________

COMPATIBILITY NOTES: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.
______________________________

recentChanges: Celebrate Easter with your favorite Mahjong game! Grab this spring update and continue your adventure by matching tiles and traveling through Sweden!

FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS¬†‚Äì¬†Experience these important optimizations!

comments: An absolutely wonderful game. Even better then Hearthstone if you ask me. It's so good that even I, Solaire of Astora who hails from Dark Souls, absolutely praises this game. 100% recommend. This only issue that one could run into is lag, but this is only due to the fact that I have an older phone. I'm sure that if you have a better phone, this game would be EVEN better. Praise the Sun \[T]/

Elder scrolls legends is a game with a elder scrolls taste and mechanics. Its choices, game modes and progress systems works perfect. It's story is great, and serve as a tutorial for the big part of the game. You can even unlock new dlc and decks through your progress in the game. This is truly a marvelous game. Problems like connection break occurs very rare and does not affect the game. If you like CCG and ELDER SCROLLS, then this game is highly recommended.

Hands down one of the best card games I have ever played. The gameplay is simplistic yet emersive. The different combinations of cards and deck types you can build is vast allowing you to adapt to any challenge you may encounter. While the gameplay is phenomenal, it's very easy to gain an understanding of how to play and the cards themselves. Bethesda has yet again made a game that has captivated me. Well done üëç

The first three turns of the game has an incredibly small amount of finite moves.  You wouldn't know this because the typical player will take more than 30 seconds on their first, second, and third turns.  You start to realize that on "draft" games, you will benefit more if you concede the game when your opponent is taking an agonisingly long time on the first few turns because they're putting so much thought into the only play in their hand.

Week 1: *Going to try to make this an ongoing review*. Had to lower this to 4 stars overall, because you have to either pay or grind to access all of story mode. I'm gonna buy it, but I think it shouldn't cost more than $14.99. Just mho. PvP is fun and you actually play LIVE people, not an AI running someone's cards. Level rewards seem generous and worthwhile.  Runs a bit slow, but I know it's my phone and not the app's fault. Gameplay is very fluid and makes sense. I already like it FAR BETTER than Hearthstone.

Fun game! Is very generous with card packs and rewards. Plenty of deck complexity yet easy to get into. The RnG can be troublesome at times, but I guess that's just how card games go. Would definitely recommend if you enjoy card games, specially if you're and Elder Scrolls fan.

descriptionHTML:
The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim

"The first real challenge to the CCG throne." - Shacknews

Built for skill, not chance, The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim is a strategy card game based on the world and lore of the award-winning Elder Scrolls series.

Enter the world of Skyrim, full of formidable dragons and fan-favorite characters and heroes. Play for hours or minutes across many card battle game modes that are easy to learn but challenging to master. Battle against opponents in challenging card games, and examine the arena to come up with a strategy that will end in your victory.

Enjoy card collecting combined with intense multiplayer PVP card games. Collect cards and level up your existing deck heroes to take on even more challenging opponents. Can you survive the world of Skyrim?

The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim Features:

PLAY RPG CARD GAMES ON YOUR OWN
- Strategy card games – Learn the best strategy for winning card battles in Story Mode.
- Earn legendary heroes, Legends cards, decks, and packs when you play solo.
- Draft battle decks from scratch and battle a series of computer opponents.

ONLINE PVP AGAINST OTHER PLAYERS
- Multiplayer games let you test your deck strength against friends.
- Online PVP games – Challenge online opponents in ranked play.
- Draft battle decks from scratch and battle other players who have done the same.

PICK YOUR CARD BATTLES
- Expand strategy options with Legends gameplay, which features a divided battlefield with “lanes.”
- Card strategy – Carefully place your cards in either lane to attack your opponent and their cards.
- Strategy is key – Make sure you’re prepared for whatever your opponent plays next.

LEVEL UP BATTLE CARDS
- Crafted battle – Collect cards and tailor your deck to your play style.
- Deck heroes and other cards can be upgraded by winning games against decks that contain the same card.
- Level up battle cards to improve your decks and give yourself more flexibility.

MONTHLY CCG UPDATES
- Why play a strategy card game if It doesn’t change? Add a new card to your deck every month.
- Trading card game constant updates to keep the meta-game fresh and interesting keeps the game fresh and competitive.

Explore the world of Skyrim and battle challenging opponents in intense card games. Discover the best card game strategy, and add legendary heroes and fan-favorite characters to your battle decks in The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim.

Download now and play multiplayer card games.

1370 Piccard Drive, Suite 120
Rockville, MD 28050
recentChanges: Deckbuilder
Previously, the number of decks you could have at one time in the Deckbuilder was limited to 35. That has been expanded to 50 decks.
Bug Fixes
‚Ä¢	Balmora Spymaster no longer gives negative stats and costs to some cards (such as Ancient Giant).
‚Ä¢	Embassy Disguise no longer gives Cover to a Guard.
‚Ä¢	Time is Running Out! has improved wording in non-English languages.
‚Ä¢	The ongoing Skeleton buff from Bone Colossus is now properly removed when the Colossus leaves play.
summary: RPG card game where the heroes of Skyrim battle it out in a strategy card game.
title: The Elder Scrolls: Legends

In League of War: Mercenaries, players act as mercenaries, taking on military contractors that play out on the battlefield to claim victory around the globe. Upgrade your army with futuristic tech, battle your enemies, and come out on top in this tactical war.

description: Found your own Motorcycle Club in Bloody Roads, California:Chopper, Biker and dirty streets, that is what awaits you in Bloody Roads, California. Found your own Motorcycle Club (MC) and drive around, terrifying the neighborhood and get the district under your control. In Bloody Roads, California you become a merciless outlaw, who not only loves his bike but loves having power as well. Play with strategic thinking and tactic to get the best out of the game and always be one step ahead of other players to reach your goals.Of bikers and outlaws ‚Äì the story:Back then, three years ago, I was making good business, mainly firearms. A bit of extortion, a couple girls. All on a pretty good scale. In those days, I had it all! But then I got too careless and the ATF raided my crib. Luckily, they didn‚Äôt have too much evidence against me. Still, that mess brought me three years in Rikers Island. During a yard exercise, a guy tried to knife the President of the Bastards of Hell MC. Usually, of course, the first rules in the slammer are: Don‚Äôt see, don‚Äôt listen, don‚Äôt tell. And most importantly, don‚Äôt get involved. But the MC guys were honest types. I guess that was why I didn‚Äôt just turn my head. Now the Club owed me. I guess I could a joined the MC, but I preferred doing my own thing. Still, the whole appearance of these guys really impressed me. Three years later I am finally a free man again and the clink did not tame me one bit. However, it is time to start something new. Ever since I can imagine I loved living my freedom on my chopper. My bike always was more to me than just a vehicle. So founding my own motorcycle club and painting the streets red with my fellas ever since felt natural. Together we keep the streets free of those who think can mess with us. That‚Äôs what you ought to do:Just out of jail and free again but with your own district now that you can manage from underground it is your duty to start your career as a gangster anew and found your own mc club. Your goal must be to expand the Motorcycle Club (MC) and rule the district with the help of your biker friends. Earn money, expand your influence and attack and rob other players in game. But watch out! The cops got their eyes everywhere so always remember to briber them and be sure that they keep their eyes shut and stay out of your business. With fortunes and tactic you‚Äôll be the king of the road and rule them with merciless severity.In game Features:Bloody Roads, California is a strategy and building game, that asks for strategic thinking, fortunes and tactic. These are the features you get in the game and that will keep you entertained and on the edge of your seat for hours.‚Ä¢	Found your very own MC‚Ä¢	Fight against bikers from other players in merciless streetwars‚Ä¢	Get onto your chopper and built up your own empire‚Ä¢	Earn money by running tattoo studios, bars and other establishments, to expand and built up your MC‚Ä¢	Train your bikers to keep your business going.‚Ä¢	Have a blast with this multiplayer strategy game
descriptionHTML:
Found your own Motorcycle Club in Bloody Roads, California:

Chopper, Biker and dirty streets, that is what awaits you in Bloody Roads, California. Found your own Motorcycle Club (MC) and drive around, terrifying the neighborhood and get the district under your control. In Bloody Roads, California you become a merciless outlaw, who not only loves his bike but loves having power as well. Play with strategic thinking and tactic to get the best out of the game and always be one step ahead of other players to reach your goals.


Of bikers and outlaws – the story:

Back then, three years ago, I was making good business, mainly firearms. A bit of extortion, a couple girls. All on a pretty good scale. In those days, I had it all! But then I got too careless and the ATF raided my crib. Luckily, they didn’t have too much evidence against me. Still, that mess brought me three years in Rikers Island. During a yard exercise, a guy tried to knife the President of the Bastards of Hell MC. Usually, of course, the first rules in the slammer are: Don’t see, don’t listen, don’t tell. And most importantly, don’t get involved. But the MC guys were honest types. I guess that was why I didn’t just turn my head. Now the Club owed me. I guess I could a joined the MC, but I preferred doing my own thing. Still, the whole appearance of these guys really impressed me.
Three years later I am finally a free man again and the clink did not tame me one bit. However, it is time to start something new. Ever since I can imagine I loved living my freedom on my chopper. My bike always was more to me than just a vehicle. So founding my own motorcycle club and painting the streets red with my fellas ever since felt natural. Together we keep the streets free of those who think can mess with us.


That’s what you ought to do:

Just out of jail and free again but with your own district now that you can manage from underground it is your duty to start your career as a gangster anew and found your own mc club. Your goal must be to expand the Motorcycle Club (MC) and rule the district with the help of your biker friends. Earn money, expand your influence and attack and rob other players in game. But watch out! The cops got their eyes everywhere so always remember to briber them and be sure that they keep their eyes shut and stay out of your business.
With fortunes and tactic you’ll be the king of the road and rule them with merciless severity.

In game Features:

Bloody Roads, California is a strategy and building game, that asks for strategic thinking, fortunes and tactic. These are the features you get in the game and that will keep you entertained and on the edge of your seat for hours.

• Found your very own MC
• Fight against bikers from other players in merciless streetwars
• Get onto your chopper and built up your own empire
• Earn money by running tattoo studios, bars and other establishments, to expand and built up your MC
• Train your bikers to keep your business going.

comments: I've tried many TD so far still playing this one..every level in every map is unique..  its cool how I can pick and lvl Heroes but then it takes awhile to add a new one when running out of gems (since gems are needed for Heroes) unless u pay to keep playing or just to wait for tournaments... it takes patience lol but I don't mind playing again

A great game with unique map designs and user friendly controls, free to play if you have patience and play strategically, pay to win if you want to advance faster. It is especially a good game for busy people like me who can only spend 10-15 minutes per day but need to stay in the game for a large number of days to be competitive. Don't try to use items and gems on every maps, it is fun and challenging to clear them without shortcuts. *Tip for developers*: Instead of giving purchase options for Sethos and Phoenix they could go with Yan and Narlax, gives chance for new players to compete also developers can milk in additional purchases.

Great TD game with decent difficulty and NPCs progression while still maintining a pattern making you work to figure out various strategies.  Ads have never been an issue I honestly cant remember where they are.  I think they may only be for like "double your rewards for battle" kind of thing.  90% (A) or better in my oppinion.  Mainly cause I want to see more progression.  Note I am only a few levels in so I dont know if theres a pay to get by an immpassable place yet.
*Updated* SCAM! Games slowly bleeds away your gems without mechanics being apparent. (I lost 300 gems in the last 3 days) Good luck unlocking heroes or content without paying $30-40. -2 stars.

Your game is WAY too hard. I am at level 90+ and found the first 3 worlds great fun and balanced but now you have effectively destroyed the enjoyment factor by making the enemies SO strong that you cannot possibly beat them unless you have max level heroes...and the best max level heroes require so much to level up that without paying an absurd amount of real money you may aswell give up.you have broken what could have been the best game on android with selfish Pay 2 win tactics . Uninstalling after months of enjoyment and gameplay.  You need to fix this and make it challenging but not impossible
It's really addicting, a lot of challenges and puzzles for the towers... really loved it! Good job team!   A bit of improvement: maybe an easier way to access the other worlds would be really good!?
description: This is a tower defense challenge that lies in a magical fantasy world. Epic heroes fight in a war to defend the kingdom with top strategy and a rush of inspiration. Battle with Death Knights and fight alongside with knights, dragons, wizard, ice queen, and other ancient gods in the adventure field! The forces of evil amass. Why do they march? Where is their home? No one knows. The prophets' vision is cloudy. The geomancers see little in their maps. Everyone else? They flee. The Allied Kingdoms struggle to survive. Life and all its purpose has no meaning to these fiends. Fields rot. Woods burn. The common folk suffer. Devastation is happening! The Allied Kingdoms have one choice: defend, defend, defend. Are you ready? Realm Defense is a tower defense game that challenges veteran players. Use a huge variety of powers and abilities to vanquish wave after wave of menace for over 100 levels. Travel through lush forests, snow covered mountains, and epic desert as you face off against armies of slimes, goblins, skeletons, and more. Deploy rapid-fire archers! Carve walls on the map with magic beams! Fire roaring cannons! Summon allies! Realm Defense offers variety and challenge. Overcome incredible odds with strategy and wit! descriptionHTML:
This is a tower defense challenge that lies in a magical fantasy world. Epic heroes fight in a war to defend the kingdom with top strategy and a rush of inspiration. Battle with Death Knights and fight alongside with knights, dragons, wizard, ice queen, and other ancient gods in the adventure field!

The forces of evil amass. Why do they march? Where is their home? No one knows. The prophets' vision is cloudy. The geomancers see little in their maps. Everyone else? They flee. The Allied Kingdoms struggle to survive. Life and all its purpose has no meaning to these fiends. Fields rot. Woods burn. The common folk suffer. Devastation is happening! The Allied Kingdoms have one choice: defend, defend, defend. Are you ready?

Realm Defense is a tower defense game that challenges veteran players. Use a huge variety of powers and abilities to vanquish wave after wave of menace for over 100 levels. Travel through lush forests, snow covered mountains, and epic desert as you face off against armies of slimes, goblins, skeletons, and more.

Deploy rapid-fire archers! Carve walls on the map with magic beams! Fire roaring cannons! Summon allies! Realm Defense offers variety and challenge. Overcome incredible odds with strategy and wit! Rescue helpless villagers, collect important resources, and recruit legendary heroes with deadly abilities along the way to stop evil in this standout tower defense game.  


• 100+ levels with various game play modes
• Multiple worlds to play with 4 different towers each
• Compete in tournament to show off your tower defense skills and win big prize
• Powerful heroes with unique abilities to aid you: Fee the Archer launches a deadly Kill Shot, Lancelot the Knight unleashes the Fist of Justice, Smoulder the Dragon rains down Heat Seeker fireballs and many more
• Face off against epic bosses including a Skeleton Mage that rides a giant slime and zaps your heroes and a bomb tossing, mammoth riding Goblin King
• Huge variety of enemies offer multiple challenges: Burn your enemy, freeze them, and more with 4 spells to cast in battle
• Beautiful landscapes and character animations
  

PLEASE NOTE! This game is free to play and made by people who love tower defense games. We sincerely hope you enjoy our work!

descriptionHTML:
The definitive high-definition FINAL FANTASY game for mobile phones!

Key Features:

■ A deep story and stunning visuals.
Experience an exciting story penned by Kazushige Nojima of FINAL FANTASY VII and FINAL FANTASY X fame, visualized with 3-D graphics never before seen in an RPG for mobile phones!
Each chapter release will be accompanied by grand in-game events adding new playable content and exciting customization items for your character!


■ A new and refined RPG turn-based battle.
Experience a new battle system specifically designed for mobile devices, creating highly tactical battles where each action flows into the next, chaining attacks and abilities in a rhythmic flow that brings destruction to your foes!


■ FINAL FANTASY's vaunted "Job System" returns.
Delve into a deep character customization system allowing for a near limitless number of combinations between job classes and specialized elemental abilities.
Choose your job, build your "deck," and destroy your enemies!



--------------------------------------

■Story: The Warrior of Light

Despair has cast a long, dark shadow across this land. The winds have stopped, the seas churn, and the earth rots.

The people await for a hero to appear—the hero foretold in an ancient prophecy: "When darkness shrouds the land, the Warrior of Light will come. Hope rides in his wake."

After a long journey across the Ether, castaways without pasts appear on the shores of Palamecia. One of them is destined to become the warrior of legend.

You stand among them.

Are you the hero whom the prophecy foretells?

--------------------------------------

■ Operating System
Android OS 4.0 or later

descriptionHTML:
Match sugar candies and swap rainbow drops to master this fun and challenging match-3 puzzle adventure inspired by THE BOOK OF LIFE!

Travel through DOZENS of fantastical worlds and conquer HUNDREDS of puzzle challenges! Compete and play with your friends! Download now today!

We interrupt this product description with breaking news: Book of Life has gone COCO LOCO for Dia de Los Muertos!

Goodbye beanie babies and so long fidget spinners – coconut shells are the latest craze, and they’re sweeping the citizens of San Angel into a tizzy of coco creations! Everywhere you look, residents are crafting spooky skulls out of coconut shells in preparation for Dia de los Muertos.

Sold-out grocers hang signs in their windows reading, "NO MO' COCO!" and tropical beaches have been picked clean of their natural coconut supply. It's safe to say that Mexico is loco for coco! Local hero Manolo Sánchez even posted a DIY tutorial on his blog yesterday for "Coco con Cocoa" a chocolate-y twist on this skeletal sensation.

Stay tuned as this story develops! We now return you to your regularly scheduled product description.

Features:
★ Hundreds of exciting levels themed to the animated movie

★ Featuring the voices of Channing Tatum, Zoe Saldana, Christina Applegate, Diego Luna, Ron Perlman, and Ice Cube!

★ Sugary sweet churro challenges and fun power-ups!

★ Connect to Facebook to send lives and gifts!

★ FREE to play!

★ Check back weekly for new levels, challenges, obstacles and more!

Like on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bookoflifegame
Follow on Twitter: @BookOfLifeGame
Visit our official website: http://www.bookoflifegame.com/

descriptionHTML:
Scrubby Dubby Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga! 

Soapland is full of a mysterious foam but nobody knows why. Enter this adventure puzzle, slide soaps and unveil the secrets as you remove the foam on your way. Will you be a soap star and save the day?

Take on this fantastic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score! 

Scrubby Dubby Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Scrubby Dubby Saga features: 
● A new match 3 with a twist! Slide lines of soap in challenging puzzles!
● Join Dixie Duck on her amazing adventure
● Match the soaps to clear the foam!
● Free your friends in a brand new mode!
● Create boosters and tap them to release their power
● Play with friends to see who can get the highest score

descriptionHTML:
Join Woka the Turtle’s quest for survival by shooting colored marbles and match 3 to eliminate balls coming her way! Win challenging puzzles, levels & bonuses by creating combos and achieve a Marble Legend mode!
Play Woka Woka, and experience the world’s most dynamic puzzle and fun marble shooter game!
Remember, only the most adventurous can succeed in this marbles blast jungle!

By downloading this app you are agreeing to our terms of service: http://www.wokawokagame.com/terms.php

How to play:
★ Match 3 colored marbles to blast them. Challenge your matching skills!
★ Combos create amazing powers! Discover many deluxe power-ups!
★ Powerful boosters can help you pass hard levels! Create combos, win levels and unlock them all.
★ Daily Prize: get amazing rewards every day!
★ Marble Arena: Compete with friends, get amazing prizes and get a preview of locked features!
★ Treasure Chests: hurry up and get them all!
★ Enjoy hundreds of match-3 levels, with more and more new levels added each month

Key features:
★ Icing Blockers NEW! Colored marbles are hiding behind the ice. Fire a ball into the frozen ones to remove the ice and free them.
★ Stone Marbles: this special ball brings extra XP! Destroy all the balls in front of the Stone Marble to collect it.
★ Gem, Skull, Lava or Fireworks and many other special balls - each with a unique feature
★ Challenge levels: complete the challenge and earn a Purple Star! TIP: Use Purple Stars at the Shop.
★ Short video tutorials help you in this magical shooting adventure
★ Play with friends: Connect Facebook account and sync between devices!
★ No Wi-Fi connection required - but you can connect to the internet and unlock the full game features

This relaxing game will bring instant stress relief, so sit back at your wubble bubble ball and run the marbles kingdom!
If you want to play with kids, this ultra bubble popper is perfect for you.

After the whirlpool adventure, the river took Woka the Turtle far, far away. She woke up at the beach of a completely unknown jungle. There’s no time to waste!
The Turtle needs to polish her weapon, as fight for survival starts immediately!

ALREADY A FAN? CONNECT WITH WOKA WOKA
★ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WokaWokaGame/
★ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wokawokagame/

We love your feedback. Let’s improve the game together!
Contact us at support@twodesperados.com

comments: Constantly get matched up with people that are level 50+ as a level 10. The game is obviously nothing but pay to win and luck. It doesn't even try to mask the pay to win aspect of it. The rewards for winning are laughable compared to what you need to actually progress and the spin wheel lands on the worst possible prize every single time. Gee, thanks for the 50 coins every 24 hours!

I keep loosing my coins because of glitches. I just lost 70,000 coins. Please fix. other than that game is super fun. Once I stop loosing my coin on glitches I'll change ratings. It's 2018 and it still steals my coins. Rating will remainder the same

Worst connection of any game I've ever played. When you're a new player with maybe 100 to 200 games you are sometimes matched with people with 12000 games. What's the point? I guess the experienced players play against the beginners to master their play. Seems like you would be in a pool of players with similar skills  or number of games or rank. Even if I'm close to winning a game, the connection sucks then it starts over.
This has been my favorite game for the last 2 years. I play it everyday, I'm obsessed!
I really like this game. But there is a problem u don't have reply option after goal.

comments: I have not paid a cent for this game, and have never felt forced to. With gradually increasing difficulty levels, the game is never too hard nor too easy. I love the combo of a CCG and a match three that this game has been able to do extremely well.  Not only is the game fun to play but the soundtrack is beautifully composed and the graphics are gorgeously rendered.  If you only want one game on your phone then let it be this one, you will not be dissapointed.

Awesome! This is a great way to entertain the brain! My favorite part is honestly the minigame treasure hunt. So fun!!! Sadly you dont get to play it without Glory.... I don't even care about PvP, but apparently that's the only real option I have to earn Glory and play the minigame... Wish we could get the treasure maps with other in game resources... Or make a second app just for the minigames because theyre super fun...

This game gets better and better with each update. Superb graphics, thousands of possibilities of creating your own unique army, mini-games, guilds... and all of those for free (you don't have to spend a single coin and still be a really strong player). Recommended!   PS. This game is so addictive that should be illegal ;-)

Game is an addictive grind fest! You're always making progress, finding new cards, heading towards guild goals, etc. You can have tons of fun for free, but beware - recent updates are more gem-hungry than ever before. Gems can be earned for free, but not at the rate the game wants you to spend them. Don't feel you have to.

This game sucks! The matching is SOOOO predictable. It goes like this: You move once maybe twice then the cpu goes and guess what. They get like 7-8 moves in a row. Combo after combo EVERYTIME the cpu moves. You don't get the gems you need either. I love jewel games and jewel quest but this game is not the same. Only in appearance maybe. So disappointed. Looks fun. Thought I'd have fun. But it straight up isn't.

Great game that doesn't make u wait for resources to replenish and so far I don't feel like it's pay to win. There's lots to grind for here in a good way. I recommend it. All it needs is some form of instruction. I haven't been able to figure out how the boosts add up. It's been a lot of trial and error.
description: Show off your skills in Gems of War as you face off in Match 3 battles to free kingdoms, win rewards, wield powerful weapons, and unleash devastating attacks!  KEY FEATURES* Destroy Enemies with Magic or Might ‚Äì Match gems to build up special attacks or match skulls to use your brute strength* Hunt for Treasure ‚Äì Test your matching skills by merging copper all the way up to a safe filled with rewards* Never Lose Heart (or Energy) ‚Äì True heroes have endurance so play whenever you want for as long as you want* Collect Daily Bonuses ‚Äì Login daily to receive a free gift* Lead or Join ‚Äì Start your own guild or join one and battle with friends to be the top guild in the league for fame and glory* See What‚Äôs New ‚Äì Check out the weekly event to see what bonus assembling the winning team can get you* Embark on Quests ‚Äì Unlock kingdoms and meet legendary characters who may join your team‚Ä¶ if you survive their tasks
descriptionHTML:
Show off your skills in Gems of War as you face off in Match 3 battles to free kingdoms, win rewards, wield powerful weapons, and unleash devastating attacks!

KEY FEATURES
* Destroy Enemies with Magic or Might – Match gems to build up special attacks or match skulls to use your brute strength
* Hunt for Treasure – Test your matching skills by merging copper all the way up to a safe filled with rewards
* Never Lose Heart (or Energy) – True heroes have endurance so play whenever you want for as long as you want
* Collect Daily Bonuses – Login daily to receive a free gift
* Lead or Join – Start your own guild or join one and battle with friends to be the top guild in the league for fame and glory
* See What’s New – Check out the weekly event to see what bonus assembling the winning team can get you
* Embark on Quests – Unlock kingdoms and meet legendary characters who may join your team… if you survive their tasks

Do not download this expecting it to be the game and gameplay featured in the sponsored Facebook advertising campaign. That is clearly lifted from another game, the gameplay of which didn't even represent how this game is played as in the scenes in the advert. Highly misleading and very disappointing. The actual game itself is an average mobile battle game featuring local maps like Pokemon Go or Snatch.
Make sure to join the Discord server and you can chat with the GMs directly. You'll also hear about upcoming content and events before they're announced to the public

Played for an hour. Was forced logged out. All my progress vanished in an istant. This is exactly why i wont spend a dime on mobil games. Too untrustworthy and too prone to glitching. What a waste of time and a total rip off of pokemon go.

Good graphics. Unfortunately, I don't like constant attempts to get me to spend money. The game itself was laggy. The tutorials were excessively annoying and intrusive. I.e. You level up, which unlocks a new feature, which triggers a tutorial, which forces you to stop what you were doing and do this. Right now. Can't do anything else until you do this tutorial. My last login. I immediately had a tutorial telling me to add my healer to the squad. Which was already added. So, the tutorial forced me to remove her. Meaning after that I had to go back and add her back in. Laggy, annoying, intrusive and begging for money. At least the graphics were good.
description: An AR-featured 3D fantasy RPG featuring a unique battle system and mysterious adventures. Become a Dimension Summoner and rewrite history!The lands are shivering from the grasps of evil and a great danger hides deep from within. You are the last true warrior who can unveil the truth and summon heroes across the dimensions. Be the beacon of light and bring hope back to the lands.You are the only hope. As the Dimension Summoner, you serve the king and will bring honor to the people. You will see through the chaos and summon the incarnations of heroes from different dimensions to fight by your side.AR SUMMONING WITH LBSThe forces of evil are so powerful that only the spirits of noble heroes from other dimensions can defeat them. You will train yourself to find the spirits of these heroes and summon them from your surroundings. Using your location, you will find the best places to attract heroes‚Äô souls. Through the eye of the dimensions, you can draw the symbol ‚ÄòS‚Äô or scan surrounding areas to appeal the spirits and then summon heroes of different tiers.ADJUST FORMATIONSHeroes will join you, equipped with legendary skills they once possessed in their own dimensions. In addition to these skills, you will also have the ability to adjust various battle formations by switching their position. In doing so, you will be able to eye the enemy and strategize accordingly.FAMILY OF HEROESThe heroes from the various dimensions have answered your call and have teamed up to fight together. They will morph into a new family of heroes with a united bond. Summon these bonded heroes to activate special bonds and even provide bonuses when off the battlefield. Start summoning now and save the land together!REFRESHING SCENERYIt is always important to take a break between fights. Relieve your heroes from fatigue and show them your captivating land. The picturesque landscapes and vivid creatures will be the optimal cure for your battle wounds. Never will you let the refreshing scenery here be ruined by the forces of evil!Now ready your weapons and prepare yourself for battle Dimension Summoner: Hero Arena!Receive the latest game news and claim a special prize over on our Facebook page:https://facebook.com/popdimensionsummonerFind friends, provide feedback and exchange guides in our Discord: https://discord.gg/Yu5ZqHP
descriptionHTML:
An AR-featured 3D fantasy RPG featuring a unique battle system and mysterious adventures. Become a Dimension Summoner and rewrite history!
The lands are shivering from the grasps of evil and a great danger hides deep from within. You are the last true warrior who can unveil the truth and summon heroes across the dimensions. Be the beacon of light and bring hope back to the lands.
You are the only hope. As the Dimension Summoner, you serve the king and will bring honor to the people. You will see through the chaos and summon the incarnations of heroes from different dimensions to fight by your side.

AR SUMMONING WITH LBS
The forces of evil are so powerful that only the spirits of noble heroes from other dimensions can defeat them. You will train yourself to find the spirits of these heroes and summon them from your surroundings. Using your location, you will find the best places to attract heroes’ souls. Through the eye of the dimensions, you can draw the symbol ‘S’ or scan surrounding areas to appeal the spirits and then summon heroes of different tiers.

ADJUST FORMATIONS
Heroes will join you, equipped with legendary skills they once possessed in their own dimensions. In addition to these skills, you will also have the ability to adjust various battle formations by switching their position. In doing so, you will be able to eye the enemy and strategize accordingly.

FAMILY OF HEROES
The heroes from the various dimensions have answered your call and have teamed up to fight together. They will morph into a new family of heroes with a united bond. Summon these bonded heroes to activate special bonds and even provide bonuses when off the battlefield. Start summoning now and save the land together!

REFRESHING SCENERY
It is always important to take a break between fights. Relieve your heroes from fatigue and show them your captivating land. The picturesque landscapes and vivid creatures will be the optimal cure for your battle wounds. Never will you let the refreshing scenery here be ruined by the forces of evil!

Now ready your weapons and prepare yourself for battle Dimension Summoner: Hero Arena!

Receive the latest game news and claim a special prize over on our Facebook page:
https://facebook.com/popdimensionsummoner

Find friends, provide feedback and exchange guides in our Discord: https://discord.gg/Yu5ZqHP

comments: Easy to pick up and varied game play.  Some of the controls can be a little repetitive but not to the point of distraction.  Keeps you interested and doesn't require a great expenditure of cash if you are a relatively casual player.  Plenty of good themed events.  All in all a good distraction which I have now been playing for almost a year !

I have been enjoying this game very much since I installed it maybe about a month ago. I actually stopped participating in a game that I've been in for 3 years for I find the is more entertaining, better graphics, quick response time on tickets and the community is more open. Highly recommend this game; which I might add is for all ages and gender who enjoy space battles and strategy. Thanks eh

Love this game. it would be nice to know what kind of equipment you are going up against in war like you see when you are in pursuit mode i.e. DT, CR, MS, BS and what kind of weapons and defense. Thanks for the great game

Great game with a large degree of strategy. Unfortunately, recent changes make it very difficult to obtain good heroes without P2P. This is most likely going to erode the free to play player base resulting in a game that is not as fun to play. Hopefully this can be rectified in future updates.

Collectively called the Cosments, these resources were shared between the two dominant hegemonies, the Alliance of Neos and the Federation of Terra. But an already strained peace explodes from the devastating arrival of mysterious Alien fleets. descriptionHTML:
The fate of humanity rests in YOUR HANDS. Play the #1 Space SciFi Strategy MMO on mobile! Colonize planets, build epic fleets of spaceships and battle real players from around the world!

2525 AD. Man is an interplanetary species, forced into space and fueled by the discovery of 3 powerful new elements: Raon, Nugen and Sectium. Collectively called the Cosments, these resources were shared between the two dominant hegemonies, the Alliance of Neos and the Federation of Terra. But an already strained peace explodes from the devastating arrival of mysterious Alien fleets. Humanity’s confidence is shaken to its core, and war is now unleashed across the galaxies.

As a powerful commander, both Neos and Terra call upon your aid. Colonize planets, recruit skilled heroes and develop warships to lead in battle against a multitude of enemy commanders. Along the way, you will raid alien fleets to harvest their technology, discover TRONs and EXTERs, and form crucial alliances.

A prequel to the browser scifi classic, AstroNest (1999). The universe of AstroNest awaits. Which side will you choose?

SCIFI GAMEPLAY:
● EXPLORATION EVENTS: Play for free resources to upgrade your planets, heroes and spaceships
● CAMPAIGN: Destroy space pirates, collect resources and level up your nation
● PURSUIT: Capture space pirates, bring them to justice and collect your bounty

WORLD-WIDE MULTIPLAYER:
● MASSIVE MULTIPLAYER WAR: Work everyday w/your faction and engage in fierce inter-factional war
● ASTRO LEAGUE: Weekly tournaments amongst experienced commanders
● ALIEN TECHNOLOGIES: Raid aliens and harvest their technology to empower your fleets
● ALLIANCES: Form alliances w/users from around the world to send gifts to and aid in multiplayer raids
● FRIENDLY SKIRMISHES: Battle allies to hone your skills, test new formations and get rewards

DEVELOP:
● SPACESHIP STRATEGY: Create your own unique combination of spaceship formations and weaponized them for battle
● COLONIZE NEW PLANETS: Discover and colonize new planets to mine for and develop more resources
● DEVELOP HEROES: Recruit, hire and train to develop the best heroes for each role
● ASSEMBLE TRONS: Customize robots, called Trons, to boost your hero’s abilities
● HYPER RESEARCH: Get advanced alien technology to upgrade your fleet

INTERNET DATA USE:
● AstroNest: The Beginning, requires a stable internet connection and is best played on Wi-Fi. After the initial install and updates, AstroNest: The Beginning needs to download additional game data, Wi-Fi is recommended.

For suggestions and help, please contact us at: AstroNest.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/new
Like Us on Facebook for Updates, Livestreams and Free Prizes: Facebook.com/AstroNest
Join Our Official Community of Strategy & SciFi Fans: Facebook.com/groups/AstroNest
Check Out Our Wikia for How-To’s & Strategy Guides: AstroNest.Wikia.com
Visit Our Official Website: AstroNesttheBeginning.com
Subscribe to Our YouTube: YouTube.com/AstroNest

descriptionHTML:
■ Intro

Pokémon Duel is a strategy board game that uses Pokémon figures. Build a deck with your favorite figures and then leap into a League Match! Compete with players from around the world for a chance to enter the top League rankings in League Matches. You'll fight your rivals in real time! Win duels, get all kinds of cool figures and items, and make your deck stronger!

The rules are simple! The object is to be the first player to get one of your figures to your opponent's goal. How will you get to the goal? You'll need to carefully choose your route! In duels, you and your opponent take turns moving your figures. Set up a strategic formation and attack your opponent, or simply block their path—it's all about tactics! Plan your strategy and defeat your opponents in this game of cat and mouse!

In duels, your deck is composed of 6 Pokémon figures. There are all kinds of figures, each with different moves and abilities. Keep this in mind as you build your own custom deck!

Make use of your custom deck and the AI! The AI is a reliable ally who will determine good moves and take your turn for you. Make full use of the AI and crush your opponents!

■ Notes
- Terms of Use
Please read the Terms of Use before using this application.

- Device settings
You may not be able to launch this application, depending on your device’s settings and/or how it is used. In order to maintain fairness among players, some functions may become inaccessible if certain operations (such as jailbreaking) have been performed.

- Before making purchases
Android OSversion 5.0 or higher is required for this application. Available features may depend on your device’s OS version.
Please make sure that you can use the free-of-charge features of this product with no issues on your device before you make purchases.
Certain devices and/or configurations may also cause the application to fail to work.

- Device settings
You may not be able to launch this application, depending on your device’s settings and/or how it’s used. In order to maintain fairness among players, some functions may become inaccessible if certain operations (such as rooting) have been performed.

- For inquiries
Please visit support.pokemon.com to report issues about Pokémon Duel.

That is for you to decide.- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide. Every decision you make is of vital importance.Class & Adventure- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like. Your Imagination is the only limit.- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!Battle & Speed- Real-time PVP with hand control. let‚Äôs duke it out in the Arena!- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWNÔºÅ- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!Classic placing and gain mode- No pains but gains Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.======Contact Us======FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonsurvivor2GROUP: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonsurvivor2/groupsREDDIT: https://www.reddit.com/r/DungeonSurvivor2/DISCORD: https://discord.gg/FhyPQpW
descriptionHTML:
Official sequel of classic popular adventure game Dungeon Survivor.

Dungeon Survivor II – Dark Tide is a simulation and dungeon adventure game.

This time, you will lead your daring mission to the no-man’s land, have an unexpected fantasy adventure in the ancient and mysterious continent.


Story of the World
- Be the Ruler of the Sanctuary, the eschatological Manor, guide your people and warriors to fight against the fallen Country.
- Upon the journey, you’ll encounter different people.
Will you draw out the sword or reach out your hand? That is for you to decide.
- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide.
Every decision you make is of vital importance.

Class & Adventure
- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.
- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like.
Your Imagination is the only limit.
- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!
- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.
- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!

Battle & Speed
- Real-time PVP with hand control. let’s duke it out in the Arena!
- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWN！
- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!

Classic placing and gain mode
- No pains but gains
Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.
- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.

======Contact Us======

descriptionHTML:
Manage the career of a young promising tennis player to help him become a tennis champion! Participate in e
very pro tennis tournament to rank up and increase your experience. Keep training to develop new game tactics.

During your tennis career, you’ll need to hire your staff carefully and make decisions on which tactics to use based on each tennis game. Keep practicing and get your first career ace!

Think you have what it takes to be the next great tennis player like Federer, Nadal or Djokovic? Hit tennis courts now to become a Tennis Legend!

TOP SEED FEATURES:

AIM FOR THE TOP TENNIS RANKING
★ Start your career as a promising 16 year old tennis player
★ Every tennis game, from Rookie tournaments to prestigious Grand Slams, are increasingly difficult
★ Hit tennis games to rank up and make a name on the pro circuit!

MANAGE YOUR CAREER
★ Be the tennis player you’ve always dreamed to be
★ Fun sports games let you train hard technically, physically and mentally to improve your Tennis Level
★ Learn match tactics like serve and volley, baseline defense or ace, and gain experience
★ As a sports manager, you’ll need to assemble the best possible technical staff from coaches to fitness trainers and more

EXPERIENCE A NEW APPROACH OF TENNIS GAME PLAY
★ Manage your tactics and adapt to the context (opponent, surface…)
★ Tennis game matches can be one-minute or longer

Start your tennis career and compete in every tennis tournament there is. Learn match tactics and become a tennis champion when you play Top Seed!

Download now – it’s time to make history!

=================

Tennis Fan, please support TOP SEED and help us make it the best tennis game ever!

descriptionHTML:
【Features】
- Join State War with Thousands of People
Fight against enemy state with your state members, carry out the amazing state war with thousands of players!

- Multiple Weapon Systems
Four kind of weapons, including long stick, bow, knuckles and twin blade, available for players. You can switch weapons freely during the fighting without the limited of classes.

- Summon Heroes from Three Worlds
Collect the animas, summon heroes, and upgrade the heroes to have your strongest heroes! And Summon them to assist in fighting!

- Various Combat Modes, Battle anytime anywhere
Act like God of War in 1v1 Arena, and slash with your fist in the Wild PK. Various PK modes are await. Just beat them up!

- Four Classes for Your Selection
Four classes, including Naughty Monkey, Dragon Lady, Bull Demon and Jade Fox can be selected. Each one has his merits and features. You can choose ranged or melee, attack or defense as you wish.

- Hundreds of Fashionable Wings and Attires
Hundreds of fashionable wings and attires are available. Choose what you want and show self-style!
